line: read article  ntpc is one of india’s leading maharatna psus with very high degree of computerization in all sphere of its operations such as plant o m  project management  material procurement  customer relationship management  business intelligence  paperless initiative and other business functions
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: to cater to the ever growing business needs of the organization  ntpc has two data centers  the primary data center at noida and the disaster recovery site at hyderabad
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: both the primary dc   the disaster recovery centre is designed and built conforming to the best global practices  modular scalable design and tia 942 basic guidelines for rated 3 data center
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: both the data centres are iso 27001 certified
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the data centers are concurrently maintainable  with redundant capacity components and multiple distribution paths serving the high availability requirement
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: this topology allows for any planned site infrastructure activity without disruption of the computer systems operation in any way   the main focus centred on following aspects
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: – assured availability of it infrastructure  – significantly reduce unplanned down times due to infrastructure bottle necks  – scalable dc infrastructure  – business continuity – robust it architecture to meet organization’s business continuity commitments to customers and stake holders
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the dcs at noida and hyderabad host ntpc’s business application  which provides services such as sap erp  pradip  paperless initiative   non erp applications  active directory service  ads  and network equipment
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: express computer interacted with s v srinivas rao  cgm – it  national thermal power corporation  ntpc
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: edited excerpts  please brief us on certain achievements in the area of dcs by ntpc  for e
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: g
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: reduction in power consumption  achievement of sdg goals for dcs  etc
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: in order to minimize the power consumption in dcs  we have deployed the following measures    – virtualised environment both for sap   pradip landscape  – pacs with compressor having inverter based technology  – modular upss having high efficiency in part load operation  – latest state of the art technology based bms system for effective monitoring   control  – installation of hci   hyper converged infrastructure  which includes a hypervisor for virtualized computing  software defined storage  and virtualized networking
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: multiple nodes  servers  clustered together to create pools of shared compute and storage resources
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: what kind of challenges come on the way  in making the data centre truely software defined    with the advent of emerging technologies  there is no real challenge in making the dcs truly software defined
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: in ntpc  we have already adopted hci system   sdwan
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: hci  hyper converged infrastructure  is a software defined data center  sddc  platform that is based on general purpose hardware  tightly integrated with software that integrates functional processes into a unified solution
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: this solution differs from traditional 3 tiered architectures by including complete virtualization of every infrastructure layer –networking  compute  storage
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: ntpc is planning to go for full sddc implementation to harness the following advantages
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: – automation  – flexibility  – increased agility and scalability  – reduced complexity and cost  however the challenges that can arise during the sddc’s implementation and operations are as follows   – inefficient resource provisioning  – handling of legacy/outdated platforms  – efficient work load mobility  your view on the emergence of edge dcs in the times of the pandemic  when wfh and wfa will be a trend    currently  there is no requirement of edge dcs at ntpc however  we are in the process of adopting iiot   ai applications in our operations technology  ot  area in a large scale which may warrant the requirement of edge dcs
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: while the benefits of cloud adoption are clear  it leaders still face a number of challenging questions when moving to the cloud   what will be the impact of cloud adoption on dcs    there are multiple questions before riding on the concept of cloud computing
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: – is a public  private or hybrid model best for my business needs    – what are the relative costs and risks of cloud adoption    – how long will it take me to migrate to the cloud  what’s the best way to make the move    – what if it ends up costing more and taking longer to implement    – getting vendor locked   chances of trouble getting out of    – cloud economics to understand the total cost of cloud adoption  unless convincing answers are not found for the above questions  adoption of public cloud will take some time
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: till then  dc will have to co exist in enterprises
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: private cloud and hybrid cloud adoption are the two strategies being contemplated by most of the govts   psus
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: in ntpc   we are in the process of finalising the cloud strategy and to get the feel of cloud experience  we have implemented some cloud projects
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: these are under observation
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the cloud adoption will have some impact on the dc
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: how can companies decide on the right dc model to adopt    companies can formulate requisite strategy requirement of dcs depending on the type of applications they are hosting
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the required scalability  flexibility and agility will also govern the decision of dc requirement
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: from data security and confidentiality point of view  companies may have to continue with on premise dc with private cloud or hybrid cloud adoption
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the ideal cyber security posture of dc refers to an organization’s overall defence against cyber attacks
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: the cyber security posture encompasses any security policies in place  employee training programs  or security solutions deployed
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: it is the collective security status of all software and hardware  services  networks  and information  and how secure is our dc as a result of those tools and processes
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: what is the ideal cyber security posture of a dc    it is important to create a habit of regularly monitoring and maintaining dc’s cyber security posture because cybercriminals are constantly finding new ways to take advantage of the weaknesses in a company’s infrastructure
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: adopting a more holistic approach that takes things like existing policies or systems  risk analysis programs  workplace culture  and employee education into consideration is highly encouraged
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: identifying all points of vulnerability will help the organization to be proactive rather than reactive to cyber security threats
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: choosing not to do so can lead to a major breach which usually comes with a loss in revenue and important data  and even more importantly  it can ruin company’s reputation with the public which can be almost impossible to get back
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: at ntpc  we are establishing an integrated management system  ims  consisting of service management system  sms   in compliance with iso 20k 1  and information security management  isms   in compliance with iso 27001  which is under progress
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: though isms has already been established  it also needs to be reviewed comprehensively to align it with sms and establish an ims at it
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: a soc centre is in operation round the clock to monitor any security breach
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: security polices are in place   enforced in both primary dc   dr centre
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: no it security breach was reported during the critical times of the pandemic
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: configuring of additional policies/rules  increased monitoring of security infrastructure and prompt response  successfully ensured protection against increased security threats lurking during the covid pandemic
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: if you have an interesting article / experience / case study to share  please get in touch with us at  email protected
headline: ntpc on the path of adopting an end to end sddc

line: i reviewed the gts  read review here  in november 2019 and the lookalike was indeed promising health and fitness smart wearable of its time  despite it being subjected to a few software glitches that marred the user experience
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: then came the gts 2  which brought wholesome upgrades  including the blood oxygen saturation  spo2  monitor and biotracker 2 ppg optical sensor for heart rate  stress levels  and pai score
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the successor to the gts  the second gen health and fitness tracker had everything in place  except accuracy
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: cut to 2021  has added two new models – the amazfit gtr 2e and gts 2e – to expand its portfolio
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: part of the gts series  the gts 2e is not a successor to the gts 2 but a cheaper variant of the model priced at rs 9 999
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e borrows several features from the gts 2 but does it manage to fix the accuracy issue that marred its predecessors  let’s find out     design and display    like the gts and gts 2  the gts 2e takes design cue from yet it looks novel and intriguing
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e has a 1
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: 65 inch hd amoled display of 341 pixel per inch pixel density
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: this is amongst the finest displays you get in a health and fitness wearable and the touch response is fairly good too
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the amoled panel makes the colours pop
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: thanks to good brightness levels  the display is easy to read under direct sunlight
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e supports custom display wallpapers and there are several built in display faces too to complement a new look every day
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the rectangular display has vacuum coating for scratch and wear resistance and narrow bezels around it
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: it has a 2
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: 5d curved glass that meets the aluminum alloy body
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: there is a single crown on the right that wakes up the watch and opens sports mode upon double press
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: at the rear  there are sensors and charging points
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e comes with different colour themed silicone straps  which are comfortable to wear and complements the overall looks of the watch
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: light in weight  25g   the gts 2e is comfortable to wear  even while sleeping
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: features and performance      setting up the amazfit gts 2e is smooth through its complementary zepp app
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the app detected the watch quickly and creates a connection through bluetooth in no time
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: after the initial set up  the app takes some time to check the new firmware update
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the app interface is minimal but functional  compared to its previous iteration  which was cluttered with details and information
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: coming back to the gts 2e  there is pretty much everything covered here with regard to sensors
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: it has an accelerometer  gyroscope  heart rate  thermometer  barometer  altimeter  etc
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: moreover  there is a built in gps for independent location tracking services
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e can measure blood oxygen saturation  spo2  levels  body temperature  atmospheric pressure  and altitude
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: it can also track the sleep cycle
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: besides  there are several fitness modes  including running  cycling  and swimming
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the gts 2e registers the data and syncs it with the smartphone through the zepp app
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the app shows the data through meaningful illustrations  making it easy to understand and comprehend
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: for example  if you want to see how you fared throughout the week or month  you can open the zepp app and swipe on the metric to see graphics
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the app also lets you compare data
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: battery      the amazfit gts 2e has a 246mah battery  which is touted to go on for about 14 days on a single charge
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: in real life usage  the gts 2e lasts for about nine days on a single charge with always on display enabled  vibration on  full brightness  24 hour heart rate monitoring  etc
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the battery time goes up slightly if you use the gts 2e with brightness set at 50 per cent and vibration disabled
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: at rs 9 999  the amazfit gts 2e offers the comfort of a and the utility of an able fitness tracker
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: it faces stiff competition from the recently launched mi watch revolve and realme watch s pro
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: however  its minimal design  accurate health and fitness tracking  and ability to handle basics right make it a better proposition
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: amazfit may have missed the mark with gts and gts 2 but the gts 2e impresses on several counts and is worthy of praise
headline: amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget
amazfit gts 2e review  praise worthy health and fitness tracker on budget

line: the finance minister has delivered a truly many splendored budget that ticks all possible boxes that i can think of
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: of the three as i assign to it  the first a is for boldness
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the budget goes where no previous one has gone before  it has announced it will privatize two public sector banks
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: hitherto governments  both upa and nda  have looked at psu banks as a kitty to fund their favourite projects or psu bankers as a bunch of central government officers who will do their bidding in the states
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: this forthright announcement that two banks will be privatized has pushed up shares of all psu banks
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the market  expectedly  is guessing that the end game for more and more psu banks could be privatization
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: thus merely by announcing intent  the government has made it easier for all psu banks to raise capital at better prices  thus lessening the need for capitalization
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: excellent thinking   the second instance of bold thinking is the announcement of an asset reconstruction company that will assume all the stressed assets of banks and sell them to alternative investment funds
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: while details are still sparse or nil  the intent is good enough to make investors keen to own psu bank shares  which again solves the problem of capitalising these banks
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the government also deserves an a for promising to improve the working of the nclt  which probably implies passing the amendment to allow pre packs  or pre decided resolution packages for smaller companies  that require only a quick nod from the nclt
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: net net  the efforts to clean up banks is sincere  imaginative and many sided
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: my second a for the budget is for transparency
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the government has rightly brought extra budgetary borrowing into the budget
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: this is most obvious in the food subsidy  which hitherto was being financed by the fci borrowing from the nssf
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the onboarding of these expenses onto the budget won’t burden the government because now more is available to it from the nssf for other programmes
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: a 9
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 5 percent deficit for fy21 and 6
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 8 percent deficit for fy22 is huge  but not if it is mostly acknowledging debt that the government was anyway holding under a different heading called ebr
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the third a for restraint  for want of another word  is for the government not making outlandish assumptions
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: quite contrary to previous budgets  the government is assuming that tax revenues will grow at the same pace as the nominal gdp  around 14
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 4 percent
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: and the nominal gdp growth assumption itself is less than that of most economists  which is again a show of remarkable restraint
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the government could easily have assumed a 16 percent nominal gdp and a 20 percent tax revenue growth  thus cutting down the fiscal deficit to 5
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 5 percent
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the restraint is admirable
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: so what are the risks then  the rs 9
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 2 lakh crore government borrowing through bonds is certainly a risk  but given that credit growth is still only slowly crawling up and the rbi still has the elbow room to help with omos  open market operations   this is perhaps the right time to announce a large borrowing programme
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the bond market has shown its displeasure by pushing up yields  but it may not push much harder given that rbi could jump in and buy and leave them with losses  especially now that inflation is set to recede for the next couple of months
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: even for the rest of the year  the base case is the rbi should be able to manage
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: there are other risks though   1
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: even after the government’s stated glide path of reducing the fiscal deficit over 5 years  the deficit comes down to only 4
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: 5 percent by 2026
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: this leaves open the danger of a high debt to gdp ratio for a few years
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: and if inflation and interest rates were to flare up and growth does not oblige  there is the making of a debt trap here
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: growth simply has to kick in
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: else we are in trouble
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint
aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the second risk is if an external crisis manifests before growth picks up sustainably
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: in such a case  the economy can be close to what it was in 2013 when the taper tantrum roiled us
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: to be fair  this is by no means the base case now
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint
aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: a third risk is that of a rating downgrade
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the government may have assessed this as  unlikely
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: but should a downgrade come  the debt markets may still be safe  since foreign funds haven’t been buying indian debt at all
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: the worry will be if any equity funds follow ratings in their investments
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: while the budget announcements get a aaa  on implementation  one has to reserve one’s judgment
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: privatizing banks  completing the ipo of lic  setting up the arc  sprucing up the nclt to resolve stressed loans of msmes are all laudable but very tough proposals
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: they require well drafted legislation  intelligent financial design and persuading many constituencies like unions to play ball
headline: aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint
aaa for the budget  a for boldness  a for transparency and a for restraint

line: having raised the roof with its path breaking wireless charging design  xiaomi seems to have taken modularity as the newest mantra
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: but on a road with a poignant past  does it have the bearings to come out covered in splendour   in what has been a theme of innovation from xiaomi’s corner  it seems that the popular chinese tech company is now up to working on a smartphone equipped with a detachable rear camera module
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: reports of the xiaomi smartphone with modular design  which were spotted in discovered patents by eagle eyed sources  seem to hint that the smartphone could support cameras of all sorts of shapes and sizes
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: advertisements  and the buck doesn’t stop there  as the chinese smartphone maker is also up to its eyes in coming out with a smartphone design  pretty similar to what we’ve seen from the samsung galaxy z fold series
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: in this case  the module looks like it can be attached to the top of the phone for indulging in some selfies
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: this solution offers an edge to edge display with no notch or hole punch cutout
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: if the patents do come to fruition  it would add another pioneering milestone for xiaomi  should the smartphone manufacturer choose to roll out it out in 2021
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: from the finesse in the filed patents  xiaomi clearly looks to be in the middle of something special  with a view to gathering solutions in modular design implementation by ticking off the boxes in the full screen and notch less display
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: images in the documents show the rear camera module with multiple lenses that can be removed from and assembled on the top of the device to be used as a front camera  making use of a magnetic suspension for attaching
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: the new patent filed at the world intellectual property organisation still doesn’t give out much  but it appears that the camera side of things will likely also include a receiver  a wireless transmission module  among others
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: on the other side  the foldable smartphone that recently surfaced on weibo looks to be equipped with a sizeable display crease running through the middle
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: however  it is yet not clear whether the patent filed for the detachable camera will be a part of xiaomi foldable smartphone or still a few years away from being a relaity
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: advertisements  at a glance  concerns about the phone’s water and dust resistance do come to mind
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: but then again  seeing as there’s no telling when the company intends to implement the design and launch it in the market  is very much mired in the shadows
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: speculations aside  the design has evoked a throwback to a concept that has a murky past and was much hyped when it was first mooted by google
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: let us look at what transpired at the project ara  and what roadblocks their design faced  which could help us gauge where xiaomi stands with its current vantage
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: the star crossed project ara  coming from the shed of one of the world’s most resourceful tech companies  signs of google’s deeper interest in rolling out a modular smartphone were revealed way back in 2011
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: making a slew of focused purchases  the tech giant acquired a hub of patents from an obscure and floundering israeli modular phone company  modu  for  4
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: 9 million
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: as ambitious as the concept put forward by project ara’s team looked  it had its bases in simplicity

line: seeking to come out with an evolved concept design  project ara wanted to reimagine the smartphone as a series of smaller  lego style bricks
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: the thought was  to bring to life a device that could be attached  rearranged  and swapped out in seconds
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: the inspiration came from the high end pc market  where different components of the computer can be replaced  forgoing replacing the whole package every other year
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: the ground breaking concept didn’t look far away either  considering google was at the helm of the project
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: it appears that xiaomi’s smartphone with detachable camera is page taken from google’s project ara book
headline: will xiaomi be able to do what google failed to do with smartphone

line: just to jot down what the people were about to get  project ara would have enabled smartphone users to upgrade their smartphones just by replacing a module  no bothersome repairs or buying out a completely new model for every bump

line: helping reduce the issues of e waste  it was touted to be the flag bearer for the uber distinctive smartphones in the years to come

line: paytm personal loans  अब paytm से मात्र 2 मिनट में मिलेगा पर्सनल लोन  24x7 मिलेगी सुविधा  business  oi bavita jha  नई दिल्ली। paytm instant personal loans पेटीएम यूजर्स के लिए कंपनी ने नई सर्विस शुरू की है। पेटीएम paytm  ने अपने यूजर्स के लिए इंस्टेंट पर्सनल लोन  instant personal loan  पेश किया है। कंपनी ने अपने प्लेटफॉर्म पर लोगों के लिए इंस्टैंट पर्सनल लोन की सुविधा पेश की है  जिसकी मदद स आपको मात्र 2 मिनट में पर्सनल लोन मिल जाएगा। आप जब चाहे तब इस सर्विस का लाभ उठा सकते हैं। मात्र 2 मिनट के भीतर आपको 2 लाख रुपए तक का लोन मिल जाएगा।  paytm यूजर्स के लिए खास सुविधा  paytm ने अपने यूजर्स के लिए खास सर्विस लॉन्च की है। पेटीएम के जरिए आपको मात्र 2 मिनट में आसानी से लोन मिल जाएगा। आपको इस लोन का भुगतान करने के लिए 18 से 36 महीनों तक का वक्त मिलेगा। आप आसानी स 2 लाख रुपए तक का लोन ले सकते हैं। आप अपन लोन अमाउंट को अपने पेटीएम ऐप के जरिए मैनेज कर सकते हैं। इसक लिए कंपनी ने कई nbfc और बैंकों के साथ समझौता किया है। कंपनी नौकरीपेशा और छोटी कारोबारियों को 2 लाख तक का इंस्टैंट लोन ऑफर कर रही है। कंपनी न बीटा वर्जन में ही 400 से अधिक ग्राहकों को लोन बांटे हैं।  मात्र 2 मिनट में मिलेगा लोन  पेटीएम लेंडिंग के ceo भावेश गुप्ता ने कहा कि लोग पेटीएम इंस्टेंट लोन की मदद से अपने जरूरी खर्चों को मैनेज कर सकते हैं। पेटीएम की यह सर्विस साल के 365 दिन  24 घंटे उपलब्ध होगी। आप अपनी जरूरत क मुताबिक 2 लाख तक का लोन ले सकते हैं। लोगों को ये लोन उनक क्रेडिट स्कोर के आधार पर मिलेगा। लोगों क पास इस लोन को चुकाने के लिए 18 से 36 महीने तक का वक्त होगा। इसी के आधार पर emi तय होगी।  काम की खबर  सोना खरीदने जा रहे हैं तो तैयार रखें अपना kyc  जानिए क्या है वजह

line: वीबी सिंह ने बताया कि इसका मकसद हाई रिस्क प्रेग्नेंसी का समय रहते पता लगाना एवं उपचार करते हुए जच्चा बच्चा मृत्यु दर पर प्रभावी नियंत्रण करना है।  स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों पर अधिक से अधिक गर्भवती महिलाओं की जांच सुनिश्चित करने के लिए आशा व एएनएम के माध्यम से अभियान चलाया गया था। चिन्हित जोखिम वाली महिलाओं को आशा नजदीकी स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों पर लेकर आ रही है। वहीं पहली बार प्रसव पूर्व जांच कराने आई गर्भवती महिला का आरसीएच पोर्टल पर पंजीयन भी कराया जा रहा है। गर्भवती महिलाओं का एमसीपी कार्ड एवं एएनसी भरा जा रहा है। वहीं जोखिम वाली महिलाओं को चिन्हित कर लाल रंग की एचआरपी की मुहर उनके एमसीपी कार्डों पर लगाई जा रही है। ऐसी महिलाओं के प्रसव की कार्ययोजना सहित अन्य रिकार्ड भी स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों पर दर्ज किए जा रहे हैं। इस कार्य में स्वास्थ्य विभाग निजी एमबीबीएस डाक्टरों की भी मदद ले रहा है।  ये डाक्टर कर रहीं हाई रिस्क प्रेग्नेंसी की जांच  ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों में सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य केंद्र आराजीलाइन में डा

line: press trust of india/new delhi 01 feb 21   07 58 pm  the delhi high court monday sought to know whether us based e commerce giant amazon and kishore biyani led future retail ltd  frl  were open to resolving the issue arising out of rs 24 713 crore deal between frl and reliance retail
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the counsel for both  amazon and future group  submitted that they would seek instructions and inform the court on tuesday
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: related stories no related stories found widgets magazine  the court was hearing a plea by amazon seeking direction to order enforcement of the award by singapore s emergency arbitrator  ea  restraining frl from going ahead with its rs 24 713 crore deal with reliance retail
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: com nv investment holdings llc  in its plea  also sought detention of the biyanis  directors of future coupons pvt ltd  fcpl  and frl and other related parties in civil prison and attaching of their properties for alleged  wilful disobedience  of the emergency arbitrator s order
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: justice j r midha asked the parties to inform it on tuesday if any such endeavour could be made and clarified that this should not be taken as deferring the proceedings and it would continue as scheduled
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court  which asked if any attempt has been made to resolve the issue  suggested that if parties would be willing  it can refer the matter to two retired judges of the supreme court
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court also said it will consider whatever protective order can be passed
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in commercial matters  it is always helpful to find a solution  it said
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: to this  senior advocate gopal subramanium  representing amazon  said he will take instructions on it as nothing tangible has happened
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate darius khambata  representing frl  also said he will take instructions and inform the court
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon has approached the high court seeking to restrain kishore biyani led future group from taking any steps to complete the transaction with entities that are a part of the mukesh dhirubhai ambani  mda  group
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it also sought to restrain future group from taking any steps to transfer or dispose of frl s retail assets or the shares held in frl by the biyanis in any manner without prior written consent of amazon
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the future group and amazon have been locked in a battle after the us based company took frl into the emergency arbitration over alleged breach of a contract between them
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the three domestic firms    frl  fcpl and reliance    have however contended before the high court that if amazon s claim    that it indirectly invested in frl by investing in fcl    was accepted then it would amount to a violation of indian foreign direct investment laws which permit only 10 per cent investment by a foreign entity in the multi brand retail sector
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: according to amazon  the ea award passed under the singapore international arbitration centre  siac  rules is enforceable under section 17 2  of the arbitration and conciliation act
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it referred to an order passed by the high court on december 21  2020  prima facie holding that the ea s award was valid under the indian law
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate harish salve  also representing frl  had earlier submitted that amazon had a deal with fcpl and signed an agreement with biyani
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: fcpl has a shareholding agreement with frl which has no agreement with amazon
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subramanium had urged that frl shall not further precipitate the situation as the matter is being heard by the court
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in the petition  amazon has alleged that future group  kishore biyani and other promoters and directors have deliberately and maliciously disobeyed the ea award despite it being binding on them and not having challenged it in accordance with the law
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the majority respondents  action of simply ignoring the order  of ea  and continuing with the impugned transaction  deal  is not only contumacious but calls into serious question their respect for enforceability of contracts  the rule of law and the administration of justice
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal
hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it said
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it sought to injunct future group and its officials from taking any steps in furtherance of the deal with reliance
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in august last year  future had reached an agreement to sell its retail  wholesale  logistics and warehousing units to reliance
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the siac on october 25 last year  had passed an interim order in favour of amazon barring frl from taking any step to dispose of or encumber its assets or issuing any securities to secure any funding from a restricted party
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subsequently  amazon wrote to market regulator sebi  stock exchanges and competition commission of india  cci   urging them to take into consideration the singapore arbitrator s interim decision as it is a binding order  frl had earlier told the high court
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: as per the siac interim order  a three member arbitration panel needs to be set up within 90 days  from the date of the judgement  with one judge each being appointed by future and amazon  along with a third neutral judge
headline: hc asks if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: on november 10  2020  amazon had told the court that it and fcl have appointed their respective arbitrators

line: a mammoth spending plan of almost  500 billion announced by prime minister narendra modi ’s government is expected to jump start growth in an economy battered by the coronavirus pandemic  but may not be enough to make a dent in the rising unemployment and poverty india has battled
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: finance minister nirmala sitharaman on monday unveiled a national budget that will cause the fiscal deficit to balloon to a much higher than expected 9
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: 5  in the current year ending march on the added expenditures
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: stock market investors cheered the plan  hoping for an economic resurgence and celebrating the absence of new taxes on the wealthy and corporations  while bonds tumbled on worries about the record deficit
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: still  the budget didn’t have major proposals to address the job losses  hunger  and rising pressures on the farming and rural sectors
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: in fact  the ballooning deficit will force the modi government to curb spending on some rural programs in the coming fiscal year
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: modi cut back the budgetary allocation for rural development  which includes a jobs guarantee program  spending for rural roads and pension for widows  by 10  to 1
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: march 19 20  xiaomi की ओर से इंडिया में xiaomi mi 11 lite मोबाइल फोन को लॉन्च किया जा सकता है  यह xiaomi mi 11 का ही एक हल्का वर्जन है। इस मोबाइल फोन को लेकर कई लीक सामने आ चुके हैं  और इन लीक्स से यह जानकारी मिल रही है कि xiaomi mi 11 lite को जल्द ही इंडिया में लॉन्च किया जा सकता है। आइये जानते है कि आखिर इस मोबाइल फोन को लेकर अभी तक क्या क्या सामने आया है।  xiaomi mi 11 lite इंडिया में जल्द ही सकता है लॉन्च  आपको बता देते हैं कि xiaomi mi 11 lite को जल्द ही इंडिया में लॉन्च किया जा सकता है  इस बारे में जानकरी bis सर्टिफिकेशन साईट पर मिल रही है। आपको बता देते है कि नई जानकारी mukul sharma की ओर से एक ट्विट के द्वारा प्राप्त हुई है।  if an exclusive report by  gizmochina is to be believed  the mi 11 lite will launch alongside the mi 11 in the global markets
headline: the staggering smartphone xiaomi mi 11 lite will soon take in india  online listing information   digit hindi

line: com/i14jde4d7z — mukul sharma   stufflistings  january 12  2021  आपको बता देते है कि जो आप ट्विट में देख रहे हैं  आपको बता देते है कि bis साईट पर इस मोबाइल फोन का मॉडल नंबर m2101k9ai है। अगर हम mi 11 lite की चर्चा करें तो यह सबसे पहले एक वियतनामी यूट्यूबर के माध्यम से एक विडियो के द्वारा सामने आया था।  mi 11 lite का अनुमानित प्राइस और लॉन्च डिटेल्स  आपको बता देते है कि एक विअतनामी यूट्यूबर the pixel की ओर सेक विडियो पोस्ट किया गया है  इस विडियो में mi 11 lite के स्पेसिफ़िकेशन्स और रेंडर लीक हुए है। इस टिपस्टर की ओर से ऐसा भी सामने आ रहा है कि mi 11 lite की कीमत vnd  50 000 यानी rs 23 600 होने वाली है  या इसके अलावा इसकी कीमत vnd 8 00 000 यानी लगभग rs 25 200 होने वाली है। इस यूट्यूबर के माध्यम से यह भी सामने आ रहा है कि mi 11 lite को वियतनाम में मार्च के अंत तक लॉन्च किया जा सकता है। ऐसा भी सामने आ रहा है कि इसे ब्लू और ब्लैक रंगों में पेश किया जा सकता है।  mi 11 lite के लीक हुए स्पेसिफिकेशन्स और डिजाईन  youtuber द्वारा mi 11 lite के रेंडर और प्रमुख स्पेसिफिकेशन भी लीक किए गए हैं। यह एक फ्लैट होल पंच डिस्प्ले डिज़ाइन से लैस है जो शीर्ष बाएं कोने पर रखे गए सेल्फी कैमरा कटआउट के साथ आपको नजर आने वाला है। नीचे की तरफ एक चिन भी है और बैक में चौकोर आकार के मॉड्यूल के अंदर ट्रिपल रियर कैमरा सेटअप दिया गया है। तीन कैमरों के दो सेंसर काफी बड़े हैं  जबकि तीसरा एक काफी छोटा है।  स्पेक्स आदि की बात करें तो youtuber ने कहा कि mi 11 lite में 120hz रिफ्रेश रेट के साथ फुल एचडी  आईपीएस एलसीडी डिस्प्ले होने वाली है। उम्मीद है कि mi 11 lite में 6gb रैम और 128gb इंटरनल स्टोरेज के साथ स्नैपड्रैगन 732g प्रोसेसर मौजूद हो।  mi 11 लाइट में ट्रिपल रियर कैमरा सेटअप में 64 मेगापिक्सल का प्राइमरी कैमरा  8 मेगापिक्सल का सेकेंडरी लेंस और 5 मेगापिक्सल का सेंसर हो सकता है। youtube ने यह भी बताया कि mi 11 लाइट में रियर फिंगरप्रिंट सेंसर होने की उम्मीद है  लेकिन रेंडर पर कटआउट नज़र नहीं आता है। हालाँकि इस जानकारी को अभी ज्यादा गंभीरता से नहीं लेना चाहिए  क्योंकि कंपनी की ओर से आधिकारिक तौर पर कुछ भी सामने नहीं आया है।

line: the proposed vehicle scrappage policy will provide thrust on the procurement of new automobiles and have a strong positive effect by boosting atmanirbhar bharat
headline: budget auto wrap

line: ss kim  hyundai motor india  the announcement of a scrappage policy is expected to significantly boost the auto industry and also contribute to a clean india
headline: budget auto wrap

line: it is expected that this policy would nudge electric vehicles which would also be a boost for manufacturing in india and will trigger investment in clean technology and also reduce our fuel import bill
headline: budget auto wrap

line: l viswanathan  partner  cyril amarchand mangaldas  new delhi  the budget 2021 22 came as a mixed bag for the automobile industry with the much awaited scrappage policy coming to fore  though with a voluntary tag to it  and some increase in taxes on critical components like powertrain aimed at making india self reliant  even as automakers hint at price hikes on the anvil
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the increase in duty on auto components was unexpected during this revival period
headline: budget auto wrap

line: it will increase production cost  leading to higher cost for consumers   martin schwenk  managing director and ceo  mercedes benz india  said in a media release
headline: budget auto wrap

line: there could have been further push towards e mobility by lowering import duties on ev   he added
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the managing director of skoda auto volkswagen india  gurpratap boparai  said the increase in customs duty on certain auto parts to 15  will further increase input costs and prices for cars that depend on specialised components that cannot be manufactured locally due to unviable volumes
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the auto industry overall hailed the budget and welcomed the scrappage policy that was in the making for decades
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the fm nirmala sitharaman announced it based on fitness tests in the period of 20 years for personal vehicles and 15 years for the highly exploited commercial vehicles
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the president  society of indian automobile manufacturers  siam   kenichi ayukawa  did not say anything on the price hike
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the government has adopted an expansionary stance with a thrust on infrastructure building with measures for efficiency improvement and increasing competitiveness
headline: budget auto wrap

line: good macroeconomic growth will translate to good auto sector demand
headline: budget auto wrap

line: specifically  the vehicle scrappage scheme has a good intent and the auto industry would be keen to work with the government on suggestions for maximizing benefits to the environment and society
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the industry has been lobbying hard to develop a scrapping procedure that would help rejuvenate it by replacing the older vehicles and create a residual industry out of these scrapped older vehicles
headline: budget auto wrap

line: hyundai motor india managing director and chief executive officer ss kim  said the proposed vehicle scrappage policy will provide thrust on the procurement of new automobiles and have a strong positive effect by boosting atmanirbhar bharat
headline: budget auto wrap

line: vikram kirloskar  vice chairman  toyota kirloskar motor  said from an auto industry perspective  the long awaited voluntary scrappage policy can help take older vehicles off the roads and contribute to lower fuel consumption  pollution and generate additional demand for cleaner new vehicles
headline: budget auto wrap

line: we at toyota kirloskar motor have continuously worked for creating a self reliant and competitive local manufacturing eco system and are eagerly looking forward to the details of the production linked incentive scheme that can potentially make india a part of the global supply chain for both traditional and advanced automotive technologies   he said
headline: budget auto wrap

line: l viswanathan  partner  cyril amarchand mangaldas  said   the announcement of a scrappage policy is expected to significantly boost the auto industry and also contribute to a clean india
headline: budget auto wrap

line: it is expected that this policy would nudge electric vehicles which would also be a boost for manufacturing in india and will trigger investment in clean technology and also reduce our fuel import bill
headline: budget auto wrap

line: on the other hand there’s a sum of inr 18 000 crore to support acquisition of over 20 000 buses that is expected to propel sales in the beleaguered commercial vehicle market and generate incremental volumes for manufacturers
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the positive signals for the manufacturing sector in the budget 2021 were welcomed by ashok leyland md and ceo vipin sondhi
headline: budget auto wrap

line: he said   the rs 18 000 crore scheme to augment public transport in urban areas with the addition of 20 000 new buses in a ppp model would ensure cleaner and efficient public transportation and ease congestion
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the government has also come out with steps to support the msme sector
headline: budget auto wrap

line: in this budget  it has provided inr 15 700 crore to this sector  more than double of last year  that could help the automobile dealerships that come under the preview of  msme   and provide some benefits
headline: budget auto wrap

line: also the allocation of inr 50 000 crore for the national research foundation could help the industry develop some cutting edge technology to become self reliant
headline: budget auto wrap

line: it was not only evs that were missed in the budget  as martin schwenk said  it was also the failure to address the sensitive issue of not  rationalising the gst  on the automobile industry that is the single largest contributor in this revenue stream and is also the largest organised manufacturer in the country
headline: budget auto wrap

line: another factor that would make commodities expensive is the imposition of agriculture infrastructure and development cess  aidc  on petrol and diesel
headline: budget auto wrap

line: even if the government has cut the basic excise duty  bed  and special additional excise duty  saed  rates to avoid any financial burden on the consumer  the basic excise duty of inr 1
headline: budget auto wrap

line: 4  and inr 1
headline: budget auto wrap

line: 8 per litre  respectively  on unbranded petrol and diesel will bring the burden in some way to the market
headline: budget auto wrap

line: depressed sales bother the automobile industry the most
headline: budget auto wrap

line: it is important to keep in mind that even in the coming financial year  the passenger vehicle market is unlikely to reach the 2018 levels and the much required rationalisation of gst and abolition of cess to aid the auto industry was missing   boparai added
headline: budget auto wrap

line: automotive component manufacturers association president deepak jain said the increase in basic customs duty on select auto components will encourage local manufacturing of such items and help india in its path of atmanirbhar
headline: budget auto wrap

line: the auto industry is likely to get a major fillip from the scrappage scheme
headline: budget auto wrap

line: road transport  highways and msmes minister nitin gadkari said the policy will lead to new investment of around rs 10 000 crore and create as many as 50 000 jobs
headline: budget auto wrap

line: adding that the policy would cover over 1 crore light  medium and heavy motor vehicles
headline: budget auto wrap

line: many of the automotive players like maruti suzuki  tata motors and mahindra   mahindra are already probing scrappage opportunities in the indian market and are developing it as a full fledged business activity across india

line: western  australia  sydney  several australian states and territories have imposed border restrictions on travellers from wa  on monday after a quarantine security guard tested positive to covid 19 and triggered a hard lockdown in the state
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: local authorities said the man could have the highly infectious covid 19 strain that was initially found in britain   and the whole metropolitan area of wa s capital city of perth  peel region and south west region entered into a five day lockdown since 6 00 pm on sunday
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: several states and territories acted swiftly to declare the lockdown regions in wa as covid 19 hotspots and introduced travel restrictions
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: queensland health ministry said anyone who has been in metropolitan perth  peel or the south west region of wa since january 25 would be required to go into 14 days of mandatory hotel quarantine when arriving at the sunshine state
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: besides  travellers who have been to those high risk areas but are already in queensland should get tested and isolate until they get a negative test
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: the state of victoria went further to restrict any new arrivals from the lockdown regions in wa from sunday night
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: as of 9 00 pm victorian  aedt  time on sunday  the perth metropolitan area  the peel region and the south west region of wa have moved from a green zone to a red zone   victoria s department of health and human services said in a statement on monday
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: if you have been in one of these currently listed wa red zones since january 25  you will not be allowed to enter victoria without an exception  exemption or permitted worker permit
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: travellers who came from the area and had already arrived in victoria were informed to get tested and remain isolated until they receive a negative test
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: the new south wales  nsw  government also issued a new public health order late sunday to place travellers from wa under the same  stay at home  restrictions as they would have faced had they stayed in wa
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: any travellers who have been at places of concern will be required to be tested and isolate for 14 days if they attended any of the named venues   nsw health said in a statement
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: any people who have been in any of the named local government areas since january 25 will be required to get tested within 48 hours of arrival in nsw
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: they will also have to stay at home for five days until 9 00 pm on friday
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

line: passengers who arrived in sydney on a flight from perth last evening were screened for covid 19 symptoms and none of them reported being at any of the venues of concern in wa
headline: australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case
australian states introduce travel restrictions on western australia after new covid 19 case

headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: during her union budget 2021 speech on monday  finance minister nirmala sitharaman  said   the government is committed to make the international financial services centre  ifsc  in gift city a global financial hub
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: in addition to the tax incentives already provided  i propose to include  among others  tax holiday for capital gains for aircraft leasing companies  tax exemption for aircraft lease rentals paid to foreign lessors  tax incentive for relocating foreign funds in the ifsc  and to allow tax exemption to the investment division of foreign banks located in ifsc   she added
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: under the regulatory provisions set by the government  ifsc is a non resident zone as per foreign exchange management act  fema  though it is treated as a resident entity under the income tax act
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: the announcement is expected to encourage indian funds registered in jurisdictions such as singapore  ireland and mauritius  countries known for their tax friendly regime  to transfer investments to indian entities set up at ifsc
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: new funds set up in ifsc will be able to issue equivalent units to foreign investors in the offshore entity
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: the government had also provided exemption on capital gain arising from relocation of funds to ifsc apart from tax exemption to shareholders and unit holders for any gains that may arise on account of exchange of units
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: the comprehensive tax amendment package of providing for tax neutral transfer of investments from offshore funds to ifsc alternative investment fund  aif  along with corresponding amendments like provision for considering holding period and cost of previous owner and non lapsing of losses at the investee entity level is aimed at incentivizing the re domiciliation of india focused offshore funds to ifsc aifs   tushar sachade  partner deals at pwc and member of regulatory affairs committee at indian private equity and venture capital association  ivca   an industry body  said
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: while the government had announced the tax sops for gift city in the monsoon session of parliament in september 2020  the budget announcement clears up the path for relocation of funds
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: providing regulatory clarity on taxation and relocation of funds to ifsc was among one of the budgetary recommendations submitted by ivca
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: amendments proposed as regards to setting up in ifsc particularly on relocation of an existing fund is a step in the direction of building india as a financial services hub in the near future
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

line: however  certain conditions such as those which require the fund to be subject to applicable investor protection regulation in its original country of incorporation may need clarity failing which the objective may not be achieved   ritesh kumar s  partner at legal firm  induslaw said
headline: budget 2021  government encourages on shoring of aifs at gift city

headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: source  pti  amaravati  feb 1  pti   political parties  including the ruling ysr congress in andhra pradesh on monday lambasted the union budget  saying it contained nothing for the state
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: the centres decision to spend rs 35 000 crore for the covid 19 vaccination programme was the sole satisfying point in the whole budget  the ysrc said
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: the main opposition telugu desam party  on the other hand  blasted the ysrc for   mortgaging   the state  s interests to the centre and drawing a blank for ap in the union budget

line: the congress called the budget a  shock to the middle class and the poor
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: ysrc parliamentary party leader v vijayasai reddy said the budget was a  complete disappointment  for ap that had been eagerly awaiting central assistance to tide over the financial difficulties
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: this can be called west bengal  assam  tamil nadu and kerala budget and not the union budget
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: given the allocations  we fear the budget doesn  t apply to the rest of the states   vijayasai reddy remarked
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: there is no mention about the allocations to the polavaram multipurpose project or the metro rail projects in visakhapatnam and vijayawada
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: the proposed freight corridors between khargpur and vijayawada and nagpur and vijayawada are of no real use for the state   he said
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: he demanded that the centre set up one of the four proposed virology centres and also one of the seven major textile parks in ap
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: the rajya sabha member wanted the centre to enhance the pm kisan grant from rs 6 500 to rs 10 000 each as 65 per cent of the state  s population was dependent on agriculture
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: vijayasai reddy regretted that not a single new railway project was announced for the state
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: tdp spokesman k pattabhiram wondered what the 28 mps of the ysrc were doing in new delhi when the centre left the state totally high and dry
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: what happened to your tall claims of securing special category status to ap  you could not achieve a single project though several like the visakhapatnam railway zone  dugarajapatnam port  vizag chennai industrial corridor are pending with the centre   he said
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: while neighbouring tamil nadu got rs 1
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: 03 lakh crore worth road projects  ap drew a blank  he pointed out
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: the ysrc mps failed to secure funds even for the amaravati anantapuramu expressway  the tdp leader said
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: state congress president s sailajanath came down heavily on the union finance minister for imposing extra burden on common people by levying extra agricultural cess on diesel and petrol
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: there is no relief for the middle class in any form

line: its also shocking for the poor people  sailajanath said in a statement
headline: political parties lambast budget  say nothing it for ap

line: mediatek’s new 5g modem integrates support for both sub 6 ghz and mmwave networks to address this opportunity and give device makers more flexibility   said jc hsu  corporate vice president and general manager of mediatek’s wireless communications business unit
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: to advance users’ 5g experiences  the new modem supports the latest global cellular standards and specifications and it packs mediatek’s signature power savings technologies along with ultra fast speeds
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s 5g modems are ideal for a range of devices  including smartphones  pcs  mi fi hotspots  broadband customer premise equipment  cpe   industrial iot applications and more
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s first generation 5g modem  the m70  is built into mediatek’s dimensity series of powerful and power efficient chipsets for 5g smartphones
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the company’s 5g portfolio also includes the mediatek t700  which will power 5g pcs set to hit the market in 2021  along with mediatek’s t750 chipset for 5g fixed wireless access routers  fwa  and mobile hotspot devices
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 has been tested against industry standards and is expected to sample with customers later in 2021
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: it offers operators around the world support for a full range of radio access technologies   3gpp release 16 standard  sub 6 ghz and mmwave dual connectivity and carrier aggregation  5g nr  fr1  with more than two carrier aggregation  5g mmwave  fr2  up to 8cc  5g carrier aggregation with mixed duplex  tdd   fdd   dynamic spectrum sharing  dss  ready  the m80 integrates mediatek’s 5g ultrasave technologies which improve on the single chip design to provide another layer of extensive power saving enhancements
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s ultrasave network environment detection and ultrasave ota content awareness technologies dynamically adjust power configuration and operating frequency based on the network environment
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 also integrates mediatek’s dynamic bandwidth part  bwp  technology which is designed to optimize bandwidth use to accommodate light or heavy data throughput requests
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: additionally  with the m80’s connected mode drx  c drx  technology the modem will regularly remain powered in connected standby even when there is no data activity
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek works closely with operators and partners around the world to bring consumers faster and more reliable 5g experiences
headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

headline: m80 5g modem with support for mmwave   sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: लोन के लिए नंगी तस्वीरों की डिमांड  इंस्टैंट लोन ऐप्स कंपनियों का फूटा भांडा  चीन से ताल्लुक रखती हैं कंपनियां  हैदराबाद  तत्काल ऋण  instant loan  देने वाले ऐप्स के खिलाफ तेलंगाना  telangana  और आंध्र प्रदेश  andhra pradesh  सरकारों की पुलिस ने हाल के दिनों में सख्त कार्रवाई की है। दोनों राज्यों की पुलिस ने दिल्ली  delhi  सहित कई शहरों में छापेमारियां की हैं और कुछ लोगों को इस सिलसिले में गिरफ्तार भी किया है। अब सीआईडी की ओर से जो खुलासा हुआ है उसके मुताबिक इस तरह के अपराध का चीन  china  से संबंध है। साथ ही आरबीआई ने भी अपनी तरफ से लोगों को सतर्क किया है कि वो इंस्टैन्ट लोन देने वाली कंपनियों के झांसे में न आएं। महाराष्ट्र cid के अधिकारियों ने ताजा खुलासा करते हुए कहा है कि इन ऐप्स के जरिए ग्राहकों की व्यक्तिगत जानकारियां इकट्ठी की जाती है  और चीन से जुड़ी कंपनियों को साझा किया जाता है। मामले में cid को परिस्थितिजन्य और वैज्ञानिक सबूत भी हासिल हुए हैं। सीआईडी की तरफ से दावा किया गया है कि ऐप्स के सर्वर चीन में स्थित हैं। यही नहीं ऐप को संचालित करने वाला डैशबोर्ड भी चीन से ही संचालित होता है। मामले में सीआईडी ने चार कंपनियों पर छापेमारी की थी। इनमें तीन का संचालन चीन से होता है।  ये मामला तब तूल पकड़ा जब आंध्र प्रदेश और तेलंगाना में कुछ युवाओं ने ऐप्स के रिकवरी एजेंट की धमकियों से तंग आकर खुदकुशी कर ली। आत्महत्या से पहले शेयर की आपबीती में युवाओं ने बताया कि उनकी निजी जानकारी लोन देने से पहले ले ली गई थी। जब तय मियाद पर रकम नहीं चुक पाई तो निजी जानकारियों को सोशल मीडिया पर डालने की धमकी दी गई। बदनामी के डर से कुछ युवाओं ने खुदकुशी कर ली। मामले की गंभीरता को समझते हुए तेलंगाना  आंध्र प्रदेश और महाराष्ट्र की पुलिस ने सख्त कदम उठाए और जगह जगह छापेमारी की गई।  न्यूड फोटोज के एवज में लोन  चीन में इंस्टैंट लोन देने वाली कंपनियों का खूब बोलबाला है। इस फलते फूलते कारोबार का चीनियों ने भारत में भी प्रसार किया है। हम इन कंपनियों के सबसे घिनौने रूप को आपके सामने रखते हैं। रिपोर्ट्स के मुताबिक इन कंपनियों के एजेंट्स मासूम और मजबूर लड़कियों को बिना जामिन कम ब्याज पर अधिक लोन की रकम दिलाने का वादा करते हैं। इसके एवज में युवती या फिर छात्रा को टॉपलेस या न्यूड फोटो एजेंट को देना होता है। तय किया जाता है कि अगर लोन न चुकता किया गया तो ये फोटोज सोशल मीडिया पर डाल दिये जाएंगे। अक्सर पैसे की सख्त दरकार की सूरत में लड़कियां शर्त मान लेती हैं। अगर उन्होंने पैसा चुका दिया तो उनके निजी फोटोज को सुरक्षित रखा जाता है। न चुकाने की सूरत में इन फोटोज को पोर्न साइट्स को बेचकर पैसा बनाया जाता है। हर स्थिति में कंपनी फायदे में होती है। जबकि लोन लेने वाला शख्स जिंदगीभर के लिए परेशान रहता है।  विभिन्न राज्यों की पुलिस को हाल में इस तरह की कोई शिकायतकर्ता नहीं मिली है। जबकि खुफिया सूत्रों के मुताबिक इस तरह के गोरखधंधे से इनकार नहीं किया जा सकता। क्योंकि ऐसे मामले पहले आ चुके हैं  साथ ही चीन में लोन देने के नाम पर कंपनियां इसी तरह का हथकंडा अपनाती है। पुलिस को उम्मीद है कि भुक्तभोगी अब खुलकर इन कंपनियों के खिलाफ पुलिस में शिकायत करेंगी। ताकि इनके खिलाफ सख्त धाराओं के तहत कार्रवाई सुनिश्चित किया जा सके। तेलंगाना पुलिस ने भी महिलाओं को आगाह किया है कि इन ऐप्स के झांसे में न आएं। कई बार लड़कियों को लोन की रकम खत्म करने के एवज में बिना कपड़ों के न्यूड फोटो शेयर करने की डिमांड की जाती है। ऐसा करने की स्थिति में तत्काल तो लोन से राहत दे दी जाती है। बाद में इन तस्वीरों का इस्तेमाल करते हुए पीड़िता को ब्लैकमेल किया जाता है। साथ ही लोन की रकम से अधिक की उनसे वसूली की जाती है।  कंपनियों के मालिक निकले चीनी नागरिक  महाराष्ट्र टाइम्स ने instant loan देने वाली कंपनियों के बारे में विस्तृत खबर छापी है। cid के साइबर अपराध विभाग के पुलिस अधीक्षक एम डी शरथ ने इस बारे में बताया कि बोरायन्क्सी टेक्नोलॉजिज प्रा लि का मालिक एक और चीनी कंपनी का संचालक निकला। इसके अलावा मैड एलिफेंट नाम की कंपनी का संचालक चीनी नागरिक निकला। कुल मिलाकर इस तरह के गोरखधंधे में चीन की सहभागिता पर चिंता जाहिर की गई है।  rbi ने भी किया था सतर्क  मामले की गंभीरता को देखते हुए आरबीआई की तरफ से भी बयान जारी किया गया। जिसके तहत लोग/छोटे कारोबारी शीघ्र और बिना किसी झंझट के कर्ज देने का वादा करने वाले अनाधिकृत डिजिटल मंचों और ऐप के झांसे में न आएं। आरबीआई ने कहा कि ऐसे प्लेटफॉर्म की ब्याज दरें काफी ऊंची होती है और अतिरिक्त छिपे हुए चार्ज होते हैं
headline: national   n instant loan companies are forced to share  topless  photo in lieu of money

line: इसके साथ ही  वे मोबाइन फोन धारकों के डेटा का गलत इस्तेमाल भी किया जा सकता है।  यूनिवर्सिटी स्टूडेंट्स को फांसती है कंपनियां  दक्षिण भारत सहित देश के कई यूनिवर्सिटी कैंपस में लोन देने वाली कंपनियों की गहरी पैठ होती है। बाहर से पढ़ने आने वाले बच्चों को ये बिना झंझट लोन लेने का जुगाड़ समझाते हैं। मौज मस्ती के नाम पर बच्चे अक्सर इनसे मोटी रकम लोन के तौर पर ले लेते हैं। फिर बच्चों को धमकी दी जाती है कि वो लोन की रकम जल्द चुकता करें  वरना उनके अभिभावकों को इत्तला कर दी जाएगी। डरे सहमे बच्चे कई बार लोन चुकाने की गरज से गलत काम में लिप्त हो जाते हैं।    dailyhunt  disclaimer  this story is auto aggregated by a computer program and has not been created or edited by dailyhunt
