line: mumbai  heading into her budget speech earlier today  finance minister nirmala sitharaman had a lot of expectations riding on her shoulders given the backdrop of a contracting economy scarred by the covid 19 pandemic and dwindling leg room because of diminishing government coffers
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: her previous two budget speeches had drawn mixed reactions from the stock market  to put it mildly
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: investors expected something averse this time too as reflected in the more than 6 per cent correction in the stock market heading into today’s speech
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: yet  within half an hour of her speech  it was clear to everyone that she was on course to deliver her best budget to date
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: by the end of her speech  the nifty and sensex had soared over 3 per cent each
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: both the benchmarks ended the day 5 per cent higher and recorded their best budget day point wise gains ever
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: it’s a pro growth  pro business and pro india budget and will probably go down in history as one of the most progressive budgets of modern india   said ritu arora – ceo and cio  allianz investment management  who manages over  40 billion in assets
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: the minister chose to shrug at fiscal hawks and deliver a 34 per cent jump in capital expenditure hoping that the higher infrastructure outlay will kick start a virtuous economic cycle with a high multiplier effect
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: it will  but obviously  come at the cost of blowing the fiscal deficit to 6
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: 8 per cent of gdp in the next fiscal year  miles above what economists expected
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: but their  too  she offered an olive branch to the rating agencies by promising to bring it down to less than 4 per cent by 2025 26
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution
sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution
sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution
sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: this shows that the government is willing to spend and spend qualitatively to boost demand and growth   sitharaman told reported post her budget speech
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: but in india  the truth is that  expansionist budgets are usually tripped up by poor execution
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: pranab mukherjee’s similarly expansionist budget of 2009  at the lowest point of the global financial crisis  was later blamed for sparking the worst banking crisis in the nation’s history  while many of the infrastructure projects remained stuck on the drawing board
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: it is now upon the administrative ministries  departments and state governments responsible for executing the proposals
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: like rishabh pant  who went to australia with a poor record of recent execution  the performance of these executing organs of the government in recent past has not been encouraging   said amit kumar gupta  head of pms at adroit financial services
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

line: so while the finance minister has braved a tricky fiscal wicket with the suave of cheteshwar pujara  her bureaucracy must ensure that they execute like what rishab pant did in australia
headline: sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution
sitharaman braves fiscal headwinds  but needs execution

वैज्ञानिक स्टडी भी इस बात को प्रमाणित करती है कि  हेयर ग्रोथ बढ़ाने और हेयर लॉस की समस्या को दूर करने में अरंडी का तेल बेहद कारगर है। ये बेहतरीन कैरियर ऑयल भी है जिसका प्रयोग एसेंशियल ऑयल को आसुत या अरंडी के तेल को अरंडी के बीजों को कोल्ड प्रेस करके निकाला जाता है। अरंडी का तेल पीले रंग का  चिपचिपा और नॉन वोलाटाइल तेल है। भारत में इस तेल को हजारों साल से प्रयोग किया जा रहा है।    अरंडी का तेल बालों की ग्रोथ और स्कैल्प से जुड़ी समस्याओं के ट्रीटमेंट्स के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है। ये तेल बालों के रेशे को कवर कर लेता है  इससे बालों की प्राकृतिक नमी को बनाए रखने में मदद करता है।  अरंडी के तेल में फैटी एसिड्स के प्रोफाइल का यूनिक स्ट्रक्चर पाया जाता है। ये तेल आसानी से बालों की जड़ों तक समा जाता है। ये नमी को सील करने  बालों के रेशों को पोषण देने और बालों की ग्रोथ को बढ़ावा देने में मदद करता है।  हेयर ग्रोथ के लिए क्यों चुनें अरंडी का तेल   why choose castor oil for hair growth    1

line: हेयर ग्रोथ को स्टिम्युलेट करता है  stimulates hair growth    shutterstock  कैस्टर ऑयल को अकेले प्रयोग नहीं करना चाहिए। इसका प्रयोग किसी न किसी कैरियर ऑयल के साथ मिलाकर ही किया जाना चाहिए। कैरियर ऑयल के साथ मिलाकर प्रयोग करने पर अरंडी का तेल  हेयर ग्रोथ को स्टिम्युलेट करता है।    हेयर ग्रोथ को स्टिम्युलेट करने की मुख्य वजह इसमें पाए जाने वाले विटामिन ई और फैटी एसिड्स को माना जा सकता है। ये बालों की जड़ों में ब्लड सर्कुलेशन को भी बढ़ाता है और बालों की जड़ों को मजबूत करता है।  2
headline: what is castor oil  why should it use for hair growth

line: स्कैल्प में खुजली को कम करता है  reduce scalp inflammation    shutterstock  कैस्टर ऑयल में बड़ी मात्रा में रिसिनोलिक एसिड पाया जाता है। इसी एसिड के कारण कैस्टर ऑयल को एंटी इन्फ्लेमेट्री गुण मिलते हैं। अगर सिर की त्वचा या स्कैल्प में जलन या खुजली की समस्या हो तो  अरंडी का तेल इस समस्या से राहत दे सकता है।  3
headline: what is castor oil  why should it use for hair growth

line: हेयर लॉस से राहत देता है  may help treat hair loss   कैस्टर ऑयल में जीवाणुरोधी  एंटी फंगल और एंटीऑक्सीडेंट गुण पाए जाते हैं। ये तेल बालों के झड़ने की समस्या का इलाज करने में मदद कर सकता है। ये तेल स्कैल्प में होने वाले गंभीर किस्म के संक्रमण को भी रोक सकता है।  4
headline: what is castor oil  why should it use for hair growth

line: हेयर ग्रोथ को नियमित करता है  regulates the hair growth   कैस्टर ऑयल या अरंडी के तेल में फैटी एसिड्स की बड़ी मात्रा पाई जाती है। इसमें भी अधिक मात्रा लॉन्ग चेन कार्बोनिक एसिड्स  long chain carbonic acids  की पाई जाती है। ये मात्रा 99  तक हो सकी है। अरंडी के तेल में ओमेगा 6 फैटी एसिड्स किसी भी अन्य कैरियर ऑयल से अधिक मात्रा में पाए जाते हैं।  एक स्टडी के अनुसार  ओमेगा 6 फैटी एसिड्स हेयर ग्रोथ को बढ़ाने में मदद करते हैं। इसलिए जब आप स्कैल्प में अरंडी का तेल लगाते हैं तो ये बालों की हेल्दी ग्रोथ को सुनिश्चित करने में मदद कर सकता है।  5

line: twitter on monday suspended several accounts of high profile celebrities and organisations  including actor sushant singh  caravan magazine  kisan ekta morcha  tractor2twitr and several other politicians  farmer leaders  writers and activists  at the behest of the ministry of electronics and information technology  meity  for spreading misinformation during the farmers  protests
headline: nation n            farmers protests  twitter suspends several high profile accounts in india for spreading misinformation

line: the it ministry and law enforcement agencies had last week ordered twitter to block these tweets and accounts under section 69a of the information technology act
headline: nation n            farmers protests  twitter suspends several high profile accounts in india for spreading misinformation

line: a twitter spokesperson said that many countries have laws that may apply to tweets and/or twitter account content
headline: nation n            farmers protests  twitter suspends several high profile accounts in india for spreading misinformation

line: in our continuing effort to make our services available to people everywhere  if we receive a properly scoped request from an authorised entity  it may be necessary to withhold access to certain content in a particular country from time to time   the micro blogging platform said in a statement
headline: nation n            farmers protests  twitter suspends several high profile accounts in india for spreading misinformation

line: transparency is vital to protecting freedom of expression  so we have a notice policy for withheld content
headline: nation n            farmers protests  twitter suspends several high profile accounts in india for spreading misinformation

line: upon receipt of requests to withhold content  we will promptly notify the affected account holders  unless we are prohibited from doing so e

line: imagine walking into an atm not just for withdrawing cash but also speaking with a virtual bank manager or even completing your kyc
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: working on turning this sci fi scenario into reality is hyderabad based institute for development   research in banking technology  idrbt
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: what is promising is that last week  leading telecom operator bharti airtel demonstrated live 5g services over a commercial network in the city wherein a 1gb file  which would take minutes to download on a 4g connection  was downloaded in less than 30 seconds
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: with 5g  atms will act as an extended bank branch…atms may also become relaying points for 5g networks   said idrbt ex director as ramasastri under whose leadership this initiative took off
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: he retired in october  2020
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: when it comes to 2g  3g or 4g  ramasastri said  india has played up a catch up game with other countries  but in the case of 5g  the government and rbi wanted the banking sector to be ready to leverage this technology sooner  which is why the country’s first 5g use case lab for banking and financial services was set up at the institute in september 2020
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: the lab  which has a team of 10 to 12 people  including researchers and bankers  is focusing on developing solutions for using 5g to boost financial inclusion and leverage ar/vr  augmented reality and virtual reality  technology
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: it is within a year that the lab expects to demonstrate some solutions in these areas
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: stating that 5g could boost financial inclusion  ramasastri said   in the rural areas  higher bandwidth availability will ensure that transactions are completed as soon as they are initiated…either customers will be able to do it or the staff will be carrying these 5g enabled gadgets … that’s the poc  proof of concept  that we have to work on…   the new technology is expected to improve overall banking experience because of lower latency and higher speed
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: with 5g  minimum latency could be reduced to one millisecond as compared to 50 milliseconds for 4g and data speeds could be 10 to 20x faster than 4g
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: besides improving the financial reach of the banking sector  by improving the timings of transaction finality  5g would also make banking activities more secure as irregularities can be detected on a real time basis
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: as per an idrbt’s white paper on 5g technology  the 5g network can handle millions of iot devices and enable machine to machine  m2m  communication
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: along with higher data speeds  this would also make systems more ‘intelligent’
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: highlighting the potential of 5g technology  akhilesh tuteja  partner and head of digital consulting  kpmg india  pointed out 5g and use of iot will see transformational changes to touchless banking that will impact atms  bank branches and pos
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: by 2025  most of the connected devices will need to be 5g compatible  including gadgets  wearable devices among others   he said  adding that covid 19 and demonetisation have seen exponential increase in the use of mobile banking  digital payments and remote implementation of key processes in the financial services sector including customer onboarding
headline: banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards
banking on 5g  talking atms  touchless tech on the cards

line: 2  हो गया है  कुछ निजी बड़े बैंकों और साथ ही कुछ बड़े सरकारी बैंकों ने हाल में रकम जुटाई है  देश के बैंकों को अगर बुरे फंसे कर्ज  npa  से निपटना है और साथ ही ग्रोथ को बढ़ाना है तो 1 लाख करोड़ रुपए की जरूरत होगी। यह आंकड़ा बैंकों के कुल लोन का डेढ़ पर्सेंट है। यानी बैंकों ने कुल 104 लाख करोड़ रुपए का कर्ज दिया है। यह जानकारी भारतीय रिजर्व बैंक ने अपनी रिपोर्ट में दी है।  बैंकों का कुल लोन 104 लाख करोड़ रुपए  बता दें कि दिसंबर के पहले पखवाड़े तक बैंकों का कुल लोन 104 लाख करोड़ रुपए था। जबकि उनके पास डिपॉजिट 145 लाख करोड़ रुपए की है। rbi ने कहा है कि कुल कर्ज की तुलना में कम से कम 1
headline: banks should have rs 1 lakh crore  banks need money to deal with bad trapped debt and increase growth

line: 5  अतिरिक्त रकम बैंकों को चाहिए। rbi के शुरुआती अनुमान में यह सुझाव दिया गया है कि संभावित रिकैपिटलाइजेशन की जरूरतों के साथ रेगुलेटरी की जरूरतों को पूरा करने और ग्रोथ के लिए एक लाख करोड़ रुपए की जरूरत है। इसके तहत बैंक कॉमन इक्विटी टियर 1 के अनुपात को भी बनाए रखेंगे।  एनपीए में आई कमी  कॉमन टियर इक्विटी रेशियो दरअसल रिजर्व बैंक के कई पैमानों में से एक है जिसे बैंकों को बनाए रखना होता है। रिजर्व बैंक की ट्रेंड एंड प्रोग्रेस ऑफ बैंकिंग इन इंडिया की रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक  बैंकों का ग्रॉस npa मार्च 2019 में 9

headline: banks should have rs 1 lakh crore  banks need money to deal with bad trapped debt and increase growth

line: 2  हो गया है। सितंबर 2020 में यह घट कर 7
headline: banks should have rs 1 lakh crore  banks need money to deal with bad trapped debt and increase growth

line: 5  हो गया है। हालांकि रिजर्व बैंक ने कहा कि बुरे फंसे लोन की संख्या अभी भी सामने आनी बाकी है। क्योंकि कोविड की वजह से नए खातों को npa में डालना अभी संभव नहीं है।  सुप्रीम कोर्ट की रोक  सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने नए खातों को एनपीए करने पर रोक लगा रखी है। यही कारण है कि नए खातों को डिफॉल्ट होने के बावजूद भी बैंक उन्हें npa घोषित नहीं कर पा रहे हैं। माना जा रहा है कि सितंबर तिमाही की तुलना में बैंकों का npa 66 बेसिस प्वाइंट बढ़ सकता है। रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक देश मे 40 पर्सेंट कर्जदारों ने लोन मोरेटोरियम की सुविधा कोरोना के दौरान ली है। इसके तहत 6 महीने में रिपेमेंट करना था।  छोटे और सहकारी बैंकों का ज्यादा मोरेटोरियम  रिजर्व बैंक के मुताबिक छोटे और सहकारी बैंकों के लोन मोरेटोरियम की संख्या ज्यादा है। इसमें भी फाइनेंस कंपनियों के पास ज्यादा लोन मोरेटोरियम की संख्या है। सरकारी बैंकों के कर्जदारों में से 41
headline: banks should have rs 1 lakh crore  banks need money to deal with bad trapped debt and increase growth

line: 3 पर्सेंट कर्जदारों ने मोरेटोरियम की सुविधा ली है। निजी बैंक और विदेशी बैंकों के कर्जों में यह अनुपात 34 और 20 पर्सेंट है। बता दें कि सरकारी बैंकों में 20 हजार करोड़ रुपए की अतिरिक्त रकम डालने की सरकार योजना बना रही है। हालांकि बैंकों की जरूरत इससे ज्यादा है।  इसके उलट दूसरी ओर कुछ बड़े बैंकों ने पहले ही रकम जुटा ली है। साथ ही कुछ बड़े सरकारी बैंकों ने भी पूंजी जुटाई है। इसमें कैनरा बैंक  पंजाब नेशनल बैंक  आईसीआईसीआई बैंक आदि हैं।
headline: banks should have rs 1 lakh crore  banks need money to deal with bad trapped debt and increase growth

line: thiruvananthapuram  feb 1  pti   kerala should imbibe the best ideas and practices from different parts of india and the world  which will help transform it into a progressive and modern economy that serves the interests of every citizen  chief minister pinarayi vijayan said here on monday
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: inaugurating the three day glonal  kerala looks ahead  conference and consultation meet here  he said  we need to think collectively on ways to move forward
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we look forward to ideas that will help transform kerala into a true knowledge economy founded on new technologies and innovation
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: underlining efforts to consolidate and deepen gains made in human development  he said kerala is set for a  great transformation   building on its achievements in land reform  education health  social justice and decentralised government
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we can and must emerge successful in our attempt to find productive employment for our educated and highly skilled citizens
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we will be successful in creating a progressive and modern economy that serves every citizen   he said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: as the state prepares to draw up the 14th five year plan  2022 27  when a new government will start its term  the time is ripe for new initiatives and schemes  he said adding that insights drawn from discussions at the meet would be valuable in formulating new projects and to revise existing schemes
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: vijayan said the conference would discuss ways to boost development and manage the states agricultural  animal and fishery resources
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: as for industry  the meet will explore areas that merit special attention amid the constraints of land and population
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: other subjects of thrust will be upgradation of centres of higher education  quality services to citizens while making the government transparent  efficient and responsive and making kerala the countrys hub for skilled labour
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: kerala state planning board vice chairperson prof v k ramachandran said though the last four and a half years had been turbulent due to back to back natural disasters and the pandemic outbreak  these have also been years of achievements
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: story continues  this period saw most sweeping changes in public schooling  greater access for people to quality health facilities  transformation in physical infrastructure  a new policy in industry and it  deepening participatory local government  a renewed thrust to livelihoods and job creation  enhanced social protection measures and gender empowerment
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: in his virtual keynote address  nobel laureate economist prof joseph e stiglitz said factors that contributed to kerala s success are  competent government institutions  competent administration  participatory democracy and decentralisation  a reliance on science and the continued importance given to planning
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: kerala should reduce dependence on remittances from the gulf countries as the world was moving away from oil and has started using renewable energy sources as part of the efforts to deal with global warming  he said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: the state should formulate its own economic strategy
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: two key principles for kerala are  diversification  and  building on its current strengths   he added
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: prof stiglitz said kerala needs to work ahead as by 2050 the world would be largely dependent on renewable energy
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: it was imperative for kerala think ahead and create more jobs within the state and not depend on remittances  he said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: lauding the kerala government for its governance model of giving importance to health and education and five year planning  he said it had also handled the pandemic situation efficiently
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: dr soumya swaminathan  chief scientist at the world health organisation noted that health outcomes in kerala were  comparable to the highest in the world  and  recent data from nfhs 5 showed progress in many indicators like imr and mmr
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: observing that the pandemic had taught the importance of investing in public health  she charted out a three pronged strategy for the state to deal with its health issues
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: in kerala  there are pockets of under development  pockets of poverty and pockets where there are highly vulnerable people whose health outcomes are far worse than the rest of the population
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: this has to be addressed
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: the second is sustainability  anything we do would need to be sustainable
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: and the third is resilience in the face of health shocks that come from time to time
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: kerala has had an experience with nipah which was handled excellently and actually the outbreak was contained and controlled  with minimal impact and loss of lives  she said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: the covid pandemic  however  has overtaken the capacity of the best health systems in the world
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: therefore  this is a good time to identify where policies can be improved and also the gaps in human resources and institutional capacity
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: observing that the pandemic has brought to the fore the accelerated use of digital tools and technology  she made out a strong case for using tele medicine on a wider scale
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we have a shortage of specialists  and in order to reach more people with specialist care  the use of tele medicine is a very good option
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: oral health and hygiene market in ireland is currently valued at €60
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: 1 million  and the category experienced significant value growth in 2020
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: that growth is evident across all products and has  in part  been driven by changes to consumers’ dental hygiene habits in the wake of the covid 19 pandemic
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: people have avoided visiting the dentist since the beginning of the pandemic  mainly because they were keen to reduce their contacts or didn’t feel safe being that close to someone
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: on the plus side  many consumers have viewed covid 19 as offering them the perfect opportunity to pursue a healthier lifestyle  including improving their oral hygiene practices
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: the research was carried through an online survey across a nationally representative unit of 1 028 adults aged 18
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: the study was conducted among members of empathy research’s proprietary research panel
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: fieldwork was carried from 20 to 25 october 2020
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: oral health  the survey sought to assess irish consumers’ current dental care habits and management in the wake of covid 19
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: almost half of those inspected  45   claimed they had avoided visiting the dentist
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: from the start of the pandemic  those aged 18 and 24 were significantly more inclined to have dodged the trip  57
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: when asked about their understandings for avoiding the dentist  44  of respondents stated it was to reduce their contacts  while nearly a third  28   said they wouldn’t feel secure being that close to someone
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: our health is in more focus than ever at the moment and dental health is a key part of that   said dr niall vallely of 3 dental  in his explanations about the research conclusions
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: prevention is always better than cure  so it is worrying to see that 22  of people are only visiting the dentist in an emergency
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: having your teeth checked by a dentist every six months will significantly reduce the chances of bigger problems occurring down the line
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: also concerning is that 19  of respondents say their teeth feel healthy  so they don’t think they need to attend the dentist
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: catching a problem before there are symptoms will mean a much easier solution   he said
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: all dentists are taking their role in preventing the spread of covid 19 very seriously
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: with the guidance provided by the hpsc and hse  we are able to treat patients with the highest cross infection control measures  which keeps them and our staff as safe as possible
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: however  covid 19 has also prompted some people to improve their dental care regime
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: almost one in five claiming to have made some element of change
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: interestingly  those aged between 18 and 24 years old  45   are considerably more prone to have done so
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: among those who have made a change as a result of the pandemic  over 80  said they earned a decisive shift in their management  including cleaning their teeth for longer  46    making sure they are brushing their teeth properly  24   and applying an electric toothbrush  21
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: going electric for better clean   oral health  when it comes to electric toothbrushes in ireland  37  of survey respondents said they currently use an electric toothbrush
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: in contrast  52  believe that an electric toothbrush would better overall clean than a standard one
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: just over half  51   of those who have never used an electric toothbrush already said it was because they perceive their manual toothbrush ‘does the job’
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: many people have taken the opportunity to make positive lifestyle changes during the covid 19 pandemic and it is great to see that so many people have improved their oral hygiene regime   said dr vallely
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: i recommend that all my patients use an electric toothbrush  so it is heartening to see that this was one of the changes many were embracing
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: i can usually tell who is using an electric toothbrush from the quality of their oral hygiene  and my patients tell me they can feel the difference when they make the switch
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: survey participants were also questioned what they felt the usual critical portion of their dental care management was  with 55  saying it was their toothbrush
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: respondents aged 65  feel particularly strongly about this  63
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: the left out respondents cited toothpaste  33   or the use of dental floss  13
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: electric toothbrushes should be the first step of your dental care regime in order to achieve your own personal dental care goals  whether that be brushing for the recommended time  getting a whiter smile  or just getting that dentist clean feeling at home   said adam parker  oral b brand director uk   ireland
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: we know that the three biggest issues for irish people when it comes to their teeth are insufficient plaque removal  overbrushing leading to gum recession  and inadequate brushing time
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: our electric toothbrush range was developed with these key areas in mind
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: using an oral b electric toothbrush removes up to 100  more plaque  giving you healthier gums versus a manual toothbrush  avoiding overbrushing through built in sensors  and enabling proportionate brushing time through built in quadrant timers
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: the oral b electric toothbrushes have round brush heads which are a similar shape to what dentists use
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: category value grows by 10  in oral health  according to nielsen data  during 52 weeks to 6 december 2020  the oral health and hygiene market value  which consists of toothpaste  toothbrushes  mouth care  mouthwash and denture products  has increased  10  compared to 2019
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: this value growth is led by mouthwash and oral hygiene  with sales  18  to €14
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: 4 million in 2020
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: toothpaste is also showing strong growth  with value sales  10  to €31

line: dentists named as priority group for vaccines  confirmation was received by the irish dental association last month that dentists would be among those to be prioritised for release of covid 19 vaccines  alongside doctors  nurses and other healthcare workers
headline: oral health  pandemic triggers new dental care regimes   savedelete

line: a list of representations was made by the irish dental association to state officials at the highest level  ordering that dentists should be acknowledged as a priority group for the programme of vaccinations to be followed out this year

line: they suggested the authorities that the statement published by the department of health recognised that  frontline healthcare workers in direct patient contact roles  or who risk exposure to bodily fluids or aerosols  and those providing services essential to the vaccination programme  should be prioritised in the allocation framework

headline: another parallel to the financial crisis and what to do about it

line: hindi news  db original  explainer  ram mandir total donation   ayodhya ram mandir donation explainer  donate to shri ram janmbhoomi teerth kshetra online using upi  neft  rtgs  imps  ads से है परेशान  बिना ads खबरों के लिए इनस्टॉल करें दैनिक भास्कर ऐप  भास्कर एक्सप्लेनर  राम मंदिर के लिए देशभर में लिया जा रहा है चंदा  जानिए क्या है धन संग्रह अभियान  क्या दान देने वालों को टैक्स में छूट मिलेगी   एक महीने पहले लेखक  जयदेव सिंह/रवि श्रीवास्तव    कॉपी लिंक  134 साल चली कानूनी लड़ाई के बाद 2019 में सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने राम मंदिर निर्माण का रास्ता साफ किया। 5 अगस्त 2020 को प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने राम मंदिर का भूमि पूजन किया। अब राम मंदिर का काम शुरू हो गया है। अगले 39 महीने में यानी 2024 के लोकसभा चुनाव के आसपास मंदिर बनकर तैयार हो जाएगा।  मंदिर निर्माण के लिए श्रीराम जन्मभूमि तीर्थ क्षेत्र ट्रस्ट ने देशभर से चंदा लेने का अभियान शुरू किया है। दो दिन में ही ट्रस्ट को 100 करोड़ का चंदा मिल गया है। मंदिर के लिए कितने चंदे की जरूरत है  आप कैसे चंदा दे सकते हैं  आखिर ये अभियान कब तक चलेगा  और मंदिर कब तक बनकर तैयार हो जाएगा आइए जानते हैं

line: ट्रस्ट का चंदा लेने का कार्यक्रम कब तक चलेगा   राम मंदिर निर्माण के लिए श्रीराम जन्मभूमि तीर्थ क्षेत्र ट्रस्ट ने 15 जनवरी से चंदा लेना शुरू किया है। इस अभियान को राम मंदिर निधि संकल्प संग्रह अभियान नाम दिया गया है। राष्ट्रपति रामनाथ कोविंद ने सबसे पहले चंदा देकर इस अभियान की शुरुआत की। कोविंद ने चेक के जरिए 5 लाख 100 रुपए का चंदा दिया।  इस अभियान में पांच लाख से ज्यादा गांवों के 12 करोड़ से ज्यादा परिवारों तक पहुंचने का टारगेट है। 27 फरवरी तक चलने वाले अभियान की हर रोज समीक्षा की जा रही है  ताकि चंदे के नाम पर कोई फ्रॉड नहीं हो। इसके बाद भी कुछ जगहों से मंदिर के नाम पर चंदा उगाही के मामले सामने आए हैं।  कितना चंदा दे सकते हैं   श्री राम जन्मभूमि तीर्थ क्षेत्र ट्रस्ट के सदस्य डॉ
headline: bhaskar excliner  how can i give a donation to the ram temple  know how and how long  when will the temple be ready

line: अनिल मिश्र ने बताया कि अभी धन संग्रह अभियान का पहला चरण चल रहा है। ये 31 जनवरी तक चलेगा। इसमें लोगों से 2 हजार या इससे ज्यादा चंदा लिया जा रहा है। इसे चेक से लिया जा रहा है। इसके अलावा 20 हजार रुपए तक का नकद सहयोग ट्रस्ट की रसीदों पर भी लिया जा रहा है।  डॉक्टर मिश्र ने कहा कि अभियान का दूसरा चरण 1 फरवरी से शुरू होगा। इसमें घर घर जाकर चंदा लिया जाएगा। इस चरण में चंदा लेने के लिए 10  100 और हजार रुपए के कूपन के जरिए दान लिया जाएगा। ट्रस्ट के कोषाध्यक्ष स्वामी गोविंद देव गिरि का कहना है कि इस अभियान से करीब एक हजार करोड़ रुपए का चंदा आने का अनुमान है।  कैसे चंदा दे सकते हैं   आप चाहें तो सीधे कैश दे सकते हैं। चाहें तो ट्रस्ट की ओर से गठित टोलियों को चेक दे सकते हैं। ट्रस्ट के अकाउंट में पैसे ट्रांसफर कर सकते हैं या फिर ऑनलाइन भी दान दे सकते हैं। कैश जमा करने पर आपको उसी वक्त रसीद दी जाएगी। वहीं  ऑनलाइन रुपए देने पर आपको मेल पर जनरेट रसीद मिलेगी। बैंक अकाउंट में ट्रांसफर करने वाले लोग ट्रस्ट की ऑफिशियल वेबसाइट से रसीद जनरेट कर सकते हैं।  आप चाहें तो ट्रस्ट के अकाउंट में सीधे upi  neft  rtgs  imps कर सकते हैं। ट्रस्ट ने अपने सोशल मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म पर अकाउंट की डीटेल दी है।  श्री राम जन्मभूमि तीर्थ क्षेत्र के बैंक खातों की जानकारी तथा दान करने की प्रक्रिया का विवरण निम्नानुसार है।    details of the bank accounts of shri ram janmbhoomi teerth kshetra and various ways of donation are mentioned below
headline: bhaskar excliner  how can i give a donation to the ram temple  know how and how long  when will the temple be ready

line: com/6mrvfkmft4 — shri ram janmbhoomi teerth kshetra   shriramteerth  august 12  2020  ट्रस्ट ने पूरे देश में कुल सवा लाख धन संग्रह टोलियों को लगाया है। 8 टोलियों पर एक धन संग्रह प्रमुख रखा गया है। टोलियां जो चंदा जुटाएंगी उसे अपने अपने धन संग्रह प्रमुख के पास जमा करेंगी। धन संग्रह प्रमुख इस चंदे को बैंक में जमा कराएगा। बैंक हर दिन जमा हुए चंदे की डीटेल ट्रस्ट को भेजेगा। ट्रस्ट इस रकम का धन संग्रह प्रमुख की भेजी डीटेल से मिलान करेगा।  क्या चंदा देने से टैक्स में छूट मिलेगी   इनकम टैक्स के 80g 2b के तहत श्रीराम जन्मभूमि तीर्थ क्षेत्र ट्रस्ट को दिया गया चंदा टैक्स फ्री होगा। आप जितनी भी राशि दान करेंगे उस पर कोई टैक्स नहीं देना होगा।  मेरे घर कोई चंदा लेने आए तो मैं कैसे पहचान करूं कि मेरा चंदा ट्रस्ट तक पहुंचेगा   ट्रस्ट के महासचिव चंपत राय कहते हैं कि लोकल लेवल पर संघ परिवार से जुड़े लोगों की टोलियां बनाई गई हैं। इन लोगों को स्थानीय लोग जानते हैं। जनता से हमेशा दो लोगों के साथ पैसा लिया जाएगा। इसके बाद भी यदि कोई फ्रॉड होता है तो लोग पुलिस के पास जाकर शिकायत कर सकते हैं।  साथ ही विज्ञापन के जरिए लोगों को जागरुक किया जा रहा है। इसके बाद भी अगर आपके मन में कोई सवाल है या आप चंदे को लेकर कोई जानकारी लेना चाहते हैं तो पंजाब नेशनल बैंक ने इस अभियान के लिए अलग से टोल फ्री नंबर जारी किया है।  पंजाब नेशनल बैंक टोल फ्री नम्बर —18001809800 — केवल श्री राम जन्मभूमि के लिए। टोल फ्री नंबर पर सुबह 10 00 बजे से शाम को 7 00 बजे तक श्री राम जन्मभूमि संबंधी जानकारी  पैसा कैसे जमा होगा आदि के विषय में कोई भी व्यक्ति कभी भी पूछताछ कर सकता है। — champat rai   champatraivhp  january 17  2021  अब तक कितना चंदा मिल चुका है   चंपत राय ने कहा कि शुरुआती दो दिन में ही 100 करोड़ रुपए से ज्यादा का दान जमा हो चुका है। अभियान शुरू होने के पहले ही ट्रस्ट को 100 करोड़ से ज्यादा चंदा मिल चुका था। इसके साथ ही विदेश से भी काफी रकम मिली है। इसे अभी इंडियन करेंसी में एक्सचेंज नहीं किया गया है। वहीं  200 किलो चांदी समेत कई कीमती धातुएं भी दान में मिली हैं।  क्या इस चंदे के पैसे से पूरा मंदिर बन जाएगा या और पैसे लगेंगे   मंदिर की अनुमानित कीमत 1100 करोड़ रुपए बताई जा रही थी। नींव का प्लान अब बदला जाएगा। इससे लागत में फर्क आएगा। ऐसे ही भविष्य में क्या योजनाएं लागू होती हैं  उससे लागत और बढ़ सकती है। लागत बढ़ने पर चंदा अभियान फिर चलाया जा सकता है।  कोषाध्यक्ष गोविन्द देव गिरी कहते हैं अभी के लिहाज से मंदिर की अनुमानित लागत 1500 करोड़ रुपए तक हो सकती है। वहीं  चंपत राय का कहना है कि अभी कोई सीमा नहीं है कि इसकी लागत कितनी होगी। मंदिर बनने के बाद इसका विस्तार भी होना है। अगर चंदा कम इकट्ठा होता है तो चंदा लेने का कार्यक्रम दोबारा भी चलाया जाएगा।  राष्ट्रपति के अलावा और किन बड़ी हस्तियों ने चंदा दिया है   सरसंघचालक मोहन भागवत  पूर्व केंद्रीय मंत्री उमा भारती  मध्‍य प्रदेश के मुख्यमंत्री शिवराज सिंह चौहान  उत्‍तराखंड के मुख्यमंत्री त्रिवेंद्र सिंह रावत  मणिपुर के मुख्यमंत्री बीरेन सिंह और बिहार के पूर्व डिप्‍टी सीएम सुशील मोदी  मथुरा की सांसद हेमा मालिनी अभियान की शुरुआत में ही चंदा दे चुके हैं। आगे कई और बड़ी हस्तियां इस लिस्ट में शामिल होंगी।  मंदिर कब तक तैयार हो जाएगा   चंपत राय कहते हैं कि यह अभियान विश्व का सबसे बड़ा धन संग्रह अभियान है। अभियान के साथ ही मंदिर निर्माण का काम शुरू हो चुका है। नींव के लिए काम चल रहा है। अप्रैल 2024 तक यानी अगले 39 महीने में मंदिर बन जाएगा। यानी  वह समय जब देश में लोकसभा चुनाव चल रहे होंगे।  देश के पांच बड़े इंजीनियरिंग संस्थान  भवन निर्माण और भू गर्भ के अध्ययन से जुड़ी संस्थाओं के वैज्ञानिकों ने मंदिर की नींव और धरती के नीचे का अध्ययन किया है। नींव के लिए कार्य प्रारंभ हो गया है। 39 महीने में मंदिर बन जाएगा  चंपत राय  महासचिव  राम जन्मभूमि तीर्थक्षेत्र ट्रस्ट pic

line: com/l5lv5jaaus — ani hindinews   ahindinews  january 17  2021  चंदा तो 90 के दशक में भी लिया गया था उसका क्या   ट्रस्ट को राम जन्मभूमि न्यास की ओर से 10 करोड़ रुपए हैंडओवर किए गए। कहा जा रहा है कि ये पैसा चंदे से ही इकट्ठा हुआ था। वहीं  vhp का कहना है कि उस दौर में गांव गांव जाकर चंदे के रूप में लिए गए सवा रुपए से साढ़े तीन करोड़ रुपए आए थे। इससे पत्थर खरीदे गए। कारीगर और मजदूरों पर खर्च किया गया। vhp के तराशे गए पत्थरों का भी मंदिर निर्माण में इस्तेमाल होगा।  हालांकि  उस दौर में जो चंदा लिया गया उसका कोई लेखा जोखा आज तक नहीं दिया गया है। इसे लेकर सबके अपने अपने दावे रहे हैं। vhp के प्रवीण तोगड़िया तो इस चंदे के पैसे को लेकर अनियमितताओं की बात पहले कह चुके हैं।

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: source  pti  thiruvananthapuram  feb 1  pti   kerala should imbibe the best ideas and practices from different parts of india and the world  which will help transform it into a progressive and modern economy that serves the interests of every citizen  chief minister pinarayi vijayan said here on monday

line: inaugurating the three day glonal  kerala looks ahead  conference and consultation meet here  he said  we need to think collectively on ways to move forward

line: we look forward to ideas that will help transform kerala into a true knowledge economy founded on new technologies and innovation
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: underlining efforts to consolidate and deepen gains made in human development  he said kerala is set for a   great transformation    building on its achievements in land reform  education health  social justice and decentralised government
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we can and must emerge successful in our attempt to find productive employment for our educated and highly skilled citizens
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: we will be successful in creating a progressive and modern economy that serves every citizen   he said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: as the state prepares to draw up the 14th five year plan  2022 27  when a new government will start its term  the time is ripe for new initiatives and schemes  he said adding that insights drawn from discussions at the meet would be valuable in formulating new projects and to revise existing schemes
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: vijayan said the conference would discuss ways to boost development and manage the states agricultural  animal and fishery resources
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: as for industry  the meet will explore areas that merit special attention amid the constraints of land and population
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: other subjects of thrust will be upgradation of centres of higher education  quality services to citizens while making the government transparent  efficient and responsive and making kerala the countrys hub for skilled labour
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: kerala state planning board vice chairperson prof v k ramachandran said though the last four and a half years had been turbulent due to back to back natural disasters and the pandemic outbreak  these have also been years of achievements
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: this period saw most sweeping changes in public schooling  greater access for people to quality health facilities  transformation in physical infrastructure  a new policy in industry and it  deepening participatory local government  a renewed thrust to livelihoods and job creation  enhanced social protection measures and gender empowerment
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: in his virtual keynote address  nobel laureate economist prof joseph e stiglitz said factors that contributed to kerala  s success are  competent government institutions  competent administration  participatory democracy and decentralisation  a reliance on science and the continued importance given to planning
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: the state should formulate its own economic strategy
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: it was imperative for kerala think ahead and create more jobs within the state and not depend on remittances  he said
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: lauding the kerala government for its governance model of giving importance to health and education and five year planning  he said it had also handled the pandemic situation efficiently
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: dr soumya swaminathan  chief scientist at the world health organisation noted that health outcomes in kerala were  comparable to the highest in the world  and  recent data from nfhs 5 showed progress in many indicators like imr and mmr
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: this has to be addressed
headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: the second is sustainability  anything we do would need to be sustainable

line: and the third is resilience in the face of health shocks that come from time to time

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

headline: kerala should imbibe best ideas practices from different parts of the world  cm

line: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance  prweb2021 02 01  new product helps tax preparers quickly build an irs cyber security plan  information shield   a leading provider of cyber security compliance software – today announced the release of its latest time saving compliance product
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: the new irs cyber security plan template enables tax preparers to quickly build a cyber security plan that addresses the latest irs requirements   many of the 1
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: 2 million tax preparers in the us are small offices struggling to address the new irs requirements
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: said david lineman  ceo of information shield
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: they don’t have the time or resources to decipher the irs regulations and build a quality cyber security plan that works for them
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: we have leveraged our leading security compliance library and scaled it down to fit the requirements of any tax preparer – no matter how small
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: irs cyber plan required by law  the irs now requires tax professionals to develop a comprehensive written cyber security plan that addresses the requirements of several key special publications  including irs publication 4557  safeguarding taxpayer data
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: additional security measures are required for electronic filing or  e filing   which is now common practice
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: according to the irs  many tax preparers may not realize they are required under federal law to have a data security plan
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: in fact  each tax preparer is required to validate that they have such a plan in place when they renew their tax preparer id  ptin  each year
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: while the majority of tax preparers in the us are small offices   said lineman   the irs still requires the same security measures that are typical of larger organizations
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: this makes is especially challenging for small offices with very little resources to implement the program
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: using the irs cyber security plan template  tax preparers can quickly jump start their program  providing essential documentation and expert advice on moving forward
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: key features of the irs cyber security plan template  the new irs cyber plan template is based on our information security policies made easy product  which has been used by over 10 000 customers in 60 countries
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: cyber security plan – the cyber security plan template is a complete cyber security plan in ms word format and easy to customize in a manner of minutes
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: it contains all key topics required by various irs special publications
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: each section contains expert tips to customize the plan for the individual organization
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: key information security policies   the irs requires written information security policies covering specific topics for protecting data  including special security controls for anyone submitting electronic returns
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: topics include cyber risk management  access control  data protection  encryption  wireless security  disaster recovery planning and incident response
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: cyber security education training   the irs requires that all employees who process taxpayer data must be educated against cyber security threats
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: the irs cyber plan template includes security awareness training specifically designed for irs tax preparers
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: acceptable use policies   the irs requires that all employees who process taxpayer data must be educated against cyber security threats
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: the template includes an acceptable use of assets policy that can be used to educate employees on key compliance requirements
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: about information shield  information shield enables organizations to quickly build and measure an information security program based on industry best practices
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: our pre built security templates and integrated complianceshield platform enable a common approach to compliance with many leading laws and frameworks  including iso 27002  nist csf  cmmc  hipaa  nys dfs  gdpr and many others
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: information shield products have been used by over 10 000 organizations in 60 countries
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: a free sample of the cyber security plan template is available from the information shield web site
headline: information shield simplifies irs cyber security plan compliance

line: thoughtworks announced its second acquisition in 2021 and has agreed to acquire fourkind  a privately held finnish consulting services firm that combines machine learning and data science with strategy  design and engineering
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: founded in 2017 in helsinki  the company now has a 40 strong team of data scientists  machine learning experts  designers  engineers and strategists and has worked with 80  organizations in 10  countries
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: fourkind’s 40 employees will continue to operate from their existing premises in helsinki and amsterdam
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: the founders and leadership team will remain in post after the acquisition to grow and evolve the business
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we have been on the hunt for a company that will help us accelerate growth in our key strategic focus areas of data  digital transformation  enterprise modernization and customer experience
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we are delighted that fourkind will be joining the thoughtworks family
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: the fourkind team’s blend of machine learning  data science  strategy  design and engineering has helped their clients lower the perceived risk of adopting new approaches to artificial intelligence
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we were impressed with their track record of delivering significant return on investment for their clients’ ai and machine learning investments
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we believe that our complementary strengths and culture make fourkind and thoughtworks a winning combination   said guo xiao  president and chief executive officer  thoughtworks
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: when we set up fourkind  our vision was to help forward looking organizations create futureproof services and products
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we are most well known for ground breaking innovation in utilizing machine learning in ways that are breaking boundaries of what has previously been considered possible
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: we believe that being part of thoughtworks will offer us the opportunity to grow faster and be part of an agile and successful global team of like minded passionate technologists who want to make an extraordinary impact in the world   said jonne heikkinen  managing director   one of the founding partners  fourkind
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: this acquisition will grow fourkind and expand thoughtworks’ european footprint and significantly improve thoughtworks ability to support and service clients in finland  the netherlands and the nordics
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: related
headline: thoughtworks acquires leading finish consultancy fourking

line: दिल्ली के सीएम अरविंद केजरीवाल ने कहा   दिल्ली में बर्ड फ्लू के एक भी मामले की पुष्टि नहीं हुई है। हमने अब तक 104 सैंपल लिए हैं और उन्हें जांच के लिए जालंधर लैब में भेजा है  वहां से परसों तक नतीजे आएंगे। नतीजों के आधार पर दिल्ली सरकार को जो भी निर्णय लेने की जरूरत होगी  वो दिल्ली सरकार लेगी।   सीएम केजरीवाल ने कहा   दिल्ली के अलग अलग हिस्सों से पक्षियों के मरने की ख़बरें आ रही हैं  उन पर उसी जिले की रैपिड रिस्पांस टीम उचित कार्रवाई कर रही है। दिल्ली में आज से लाइव बर्ड के आयात पर पूरी तरह बैन लगाया जाता है। गाजीपुर पोल्ट्री मार्केट को आज से 10 दिनों के लिए बंद किया जाता है।

line: नयी दिल्ली/कोलकाता  14 दिसंबर भाजपा नेता कैलाश विजयवर्गीय की वीआईपी सुरक्षा में वृद्धि की गई और पश्चिम बंगाल दौरे के दौरान उन्हें बुलेट प्रूफ कार मुहैया कराई गई है।  आधिकारिक सूत्रों ने सोमवार को बताया कि केंद्रीय गृह मंत्रालय ने केंद्रीय औद्योगिक सुरक्षा बल  सीआईएसएफ  को 64 वर्षीय भाजपा महासचिव के काफिले में बख्तरबंद वाहन को शामिल करने और यह सुनिश्चित करने का निर्देश दिया है कि वह एसयूवी में ही यात्रा करें।  उन्होंने बताया  ‘‘ विजयवर्गीय की सुरक्षा में वृद्धि की गई और उनके काफिले में बुलेट प्रूफ वाहन शामिल किया गया है। यह बदलाव भाजपा अध्यक्ष जेपी नड्डा के काफिले पर हुए हमले के दौरान उनके वाहन को निशाना बनाने के बाद सुरक्षा के मद्देनजर किया गया है।’’  उल्लेखनीय कि पिछले साल फरवरी से ही सीआईएसएफ ‘जेड’ श्रेणी की वीआईपी सुरक्षा विजयवर्गीय को मुहैया करा रही है। इसके तहत 16 सीआईएसएफ के सशस्त्र कमांडो और पायलट व एस्कॉर्ट वाहन सुरक्षा प्राप्त व्यक्ति की सुरक्षा करते हैं।  विजयवर्गीय के वाहन को 10 दिसंबर को दक्षिण 24 परगना जिले के डायमंड हार्बर इलाके में उस समय निशाना बनाया गया जब वह भाजपा अध्यक्ष के साथ जा रहे थे।  दक्षिण 24 परगना के मथुरापुर में आयोजित कार्यक्रम में शामिल होने सोमवार दोपहर को कोलकाता पहुंचे विजयवर्गीय ने पत्रकारों से बातचीत करते हुए सुरक्षा बढ़ाए जाने की पुष्टि की।  उन्होंने हवाई अड्डे पर संवाददाताओं से कहा  ‘‘केंद्रीय गृह मंत्रालय के आदेश के अनुसार मुझे बुलेट प्रूफ वाहन मुहैया कराया गया है।’’  उल्लेखनीय है कि 10 दिसंबर को भाजपा अध्यक्ष के काफिले पर डायमंड हार्बर इलाके में पथराव किया गया था  जिसकी वजह से काफिले में शामिल कई वाहन क्षतिग्रस्त हो गए थे।  सूत्रों ने बताया कि इस हमले में विजयवर्गीय और भाजपा उपाध्यक्ष मुकुल रॉय को चोटें आई थीं।  बता दें कि नड्डा को भी ‘जेड’ श्रेणी की सुरक्षा केंद्रीय रिजर्व पुलिस बल  सीआरपीएफ  मुहैया कराता है और उन्हें भी बुलेट प्रूफ कार यात्रा करने के लिए मिली हुई है।  disclaimer  लोकमत हिन्दी ने इस ख़बर को संपादित नहीं किया है। यह ख़बर पीटीआई भाषा की फीड से प्रकाशित की गयी है।  web title  after the attack in west bengal  the center increased the security of vijayvargiya  provided a bullet proof car

line: washington  us   february 1   women with a history of diabetes during pregnancy  gestational diabetes  are twice as likely by mid life to develop calcium in heart arteries  a strong predictor of heart disease   even if healthy blood sugar levels were attained many years after pregnancy  according to new research
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: the research was published today in the american heart association s flagship journal circulation
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: gestational diabetes  which is high blood sugar levels  glucose intolerance  first recognized during pregnancy  affects approximately 9  of u
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: s
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: pregnancies and up to 20  worldwide
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: after pregnancy  women who had gestational diabetes are at higher risk of developing prediabetes or type 2 diabetes  conditions that are risk factors for cardiovascular disease
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: previous studies found a much higher risk of heart disease in women with a history of gestational diabetes who later developed type 2 diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: however  it remained unclear whether heart disease risk among women with a history of gestational diabetes was lower for women who attained healthy glucose levels or who developed prediabetes in mid life
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: in 2018  the american college of cardiology/american heart association cholesterol clinical practice guidelines specified that a history of gestational diabetes enhances women s risk for artery build up that leads to cardiovascular disease
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: using data from the multicenter  30 year prospective coronary artery risk development in young adult  cardia  study  researchers investigated whether attaining healthy blood sugar levels after pregnancy would mitigate the increased risk of cardiovascular disease that is associated with a history of gestational diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: cardia is the first study to assess heart disease risk in women with a history of gestational diabetes compared to those without gestational diabetes according to their blood sugar levels many years later
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: women with previous gestational diabetes had a twofold higher risk of coronary artery calcium if they maintained normal blood sugar levels  later developed prediabetes  or later were diagnosed with type 2 diabetes many years after pregnancy compared to women without previous gestational diabetes who had normal blood sugar levels   said erica p
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: gunderson  phd  m
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: s
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: m
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: p
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: h
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: epidemiologist and senior research scientist in the cardiovascular and metabolic conditions section at kaiser permanente s division of research in oakland  california
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: the cardia study enrolled more than 5 100 u
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: s
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: men and women who were aged 18 30 years at the beginning of the study in 1985
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: the new analysis includes approximately 1 100 women  49  black women and 51  white women  without type 1 or type 2 diabetes who subsequently gave birth at least once during the 25 year study period  which ended in 2011
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: blood tests were performed from before to after pregnancies at five year intervals to determine if women had normal blood sugar levels  intermediate elevations in blood sugar levels  prediabetes  or they had developed overt type 2 diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: heart scans were performed to measure coronary artery calcium  a strong predictor for heart disease  at exams 15  20 and 25 years after the baseline  the first exam of the study
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: at the 25 year follow up  the participants  median age was 48 years old  and 12  of the women in the study had a pregnancy complicated by gestational diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: the prospective analysis found    women with a history of gestational diabetes had a two fold higher risk of coronary artery calcification whether they had healthy blood sugar levels  prediabetes or type 2 diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: attaining healthy blood sugar levels after pregnancy did not decrease the risk of developing cardiovascular disease in mid life for women with previous gestational diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: of women with previous gestational diabetes  36  developed prediabetes and 26  developed type 2 diabetes  compared to 35  and 9  of women with no history of gestational diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: 25  of women with a history of gestational diabetes had some level of coronary artery calcium vs
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: 15  of women who never had gestational diabetes
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: we were surprised to discover that women with a history of gestational diabetes are at a significantly greater risk of heart artery calcification  even if they maintain normal blood sugar levels after pregnancy   gunderson said
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: our findings represent a shift in this paradigm by showing that normal blood glucose after gestational diabetes is still related to higher coronary artery calcium risk   the authors note
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: risk assessment for heart disease should not wait until a woman has developed prediabetes or type 2 diabetes   gunderson said
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: diabetes and other health problems that develop during pregnancy serve as early harbingers of future chronic disease risk  particularly heart disease
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: health care systems need to integrate the individual s history of gestational diabetes into health records and monitor risk factors for heart disease  as well as the recommended testing for type 2 diabetes in these women at regular intervals  which is critical to target prevention efforts
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: limitations of the study include that researchers had no measurement of coronary artery calcium levels prior to pregnancy  and coronary artery calcium scores were used as a surrogate marker for heart disease risk not cardiovascular events
headline: study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease
study links diabetes during pregnancy with increased risk of heart disease

line: prime minister mahinda rajapaksa s office said on monday that his government has decided to run the colombo port’s eastern container terminal  ect  as a fully owned operation of the state run ports authority  prompting india to demand sri lanka to abide by its commitment of the trilateral deal with it and japan to jointly develop the strategic cargo terminal
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: rajapaksa held talks with the leaders of the agitating trade unions on monday morning and the decision was conveyed to them  a release from his office said  indicating that the prime minister has succumbed to pressure from the trade unions who opposed the joint venture involving india and japan
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: advertisement  the state owned sri lanka ports authority  slpa  signed a memorandum of cooperation in may 2019 with india and japan to develop the ect during the previous sirisena government
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: the colombo port trade unions opposed the proposal of investors from india and japan buying 49 per cent stake in the etc
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: they demanded the ect to remain 100 per cent owned by the slpa as opposed to the 51 per cent
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: reacting to the prime minister s office statement  a spokesperson at the indian high commission in colombo said that all sides should continue to abide by the existing understandings and commitment
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: i would like to reiterate the expectation of the government of india for expeditious implementation of the trilateral memorandum of cooperation  moc  signed in may 2019 among the governments of india  japan and sri lanka for the development of ect with participation from these three countries    the spokesperson said
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: the commitment of the government of sri lanka in this regard has been conveyed several times in the recent past  including at the leadership level
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: sri lanka s cabinet also took a decision three months ago to implement the project with foreign investors
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: all sides should continue to abide by the existing understandings and commitment    the spokesman added
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: some 23 trade unions had joined hands to oppose the port deal
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: the unions took the stand that the proposed deal with india’s adani group was a sell out of the ect
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: they launched industrial action urging to scrap the deal and the government to run the ect operation as a 100 per cent government entity
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: the unions mostly affiliated to the ruling sri lanka people s party  slpp  forced the government not to go ahead with the deal
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: they claimed it was a sell out of the colombo port’s key cargo terminal to india
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: a committee appointed by the ports minister had reported back that the company concerned had refused to accede to concerns raised on behalf of the government
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: therefore  the deal has been scrapped
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: president gotabaya rajapaksa recently said that stopping the deal would endanger the 66 per cent of indian transshipment cargo handled by the ect
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: therefore  in order to remain competitive the deal was needed
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: however in recent weeks  the trade unions were able to mount public opinion against the deal and even got support from government’s own politicians against it
headline: sri lanka says ect to be operated fully by slpa  india asks colombo to abide by commitments

line: lucknow  after collecting a record rs 500 crore in just 17 days  the ram janambhoomi teerth kshetra trust has launched the second phase from monday to collect donations from 11 crore hindu families across the nation for the construction of ram temple in ayodhya
headline: by feb end  ram temple trust will have rs 1 500 crore in its kitty

line: briefing media  the trust general secretary champat rai said that authorized persons from the vhp and rss will visit about 5 lakh villages and towns in the country till february 27 with coupons of rs 10 100 and rs 1 000 denominations to collect donations
headline: by feb end  ram temple trust will have rs 1 500 crore in its kitty

line: we have distributed coupons worth rs 1 000 crore for the door to door campaign across the country

headline: by feb end  ram temple trust will have rs 1 500 crore in its kitty

line: wwe posted the following   wwe appoints christine lubrano senior vice president  creative editorial operations  stamford  connecticut – february 1  2021 – wwe  nyse  wwe  today announced the appointment of christine lubrano to the role of senior vice president  creative writing operations
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: lubrano will be responsible for overseeing all strategic operations of the company’s creative writing division and will report to brad blum  wwe executive vice president  operations
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: in his new role  lubrano will be responsible for developing and leading a team of writers for wwe’s weekly flagship shows  monday night raw and friday night smackdown
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: she will oversee the long term planning of the creative writing team and manage its operations in conjunction with executive director bruce prichard
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: lubrano is an emmy nominated and accomplished programming manager with extensive knowledge of the media landscape
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: in 2019  she launched lubrano media  where she developed scripted and unscripted shows while also providing executive production and consulting services
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: previously  she served as senior vice president  original programming at ifc  overseeing the development and execution of all original series and co productions
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: previously  lubrano held various executive positions at ifc including vice president of current programming and vice president of unscripted series  documentaries and live events
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: she was instrumental in the success of the emmy award winning portlandia  and a primary creative force behind the famous emmy nominated documentary  created by bill hader  seth meyers and fred armisen
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: at ifc  lubrano has also directed a series of international co productions  including three seasons of the increasingly poor decisions of todd margret  merman   year of the rabbit  objective content  and four seasons of all female canadian comedy
headline: wwe appoints christine lubrano as senior vice president  creative writing operations   tben

line: new delhi  feb 1   twitter on monday suspended several accounts of high profile celebrities and organisations  including actor sushant singh  caravan magazine  kisan ekta morcha  tractor2twitr and several other politicians  farmer leaders  writers and activists  at the behest of the ministry of electronics and information technology  meity  for spreading misinformation during the farmers  protests
