line: farmers loan waiver कर्ज की वजह से तमाम किसान एनपीए के दायरे में भी आ चुके हैं। इसके आधार पर यह तय माना जा रहा है कि कर्जमाफी योजना को अगले वित्तीय वर्ष में भी जारी रखा जा सकता है।  रांची  राज्य ब्यूरो। krishi rin mafi yojana jharkhand  jharkhand farmers loan waiver कृषि  पशुपालन एवं सहकारिता विभाग कृषि ऋणमाफी योजना को अगले वित्तवर्ष में भी जारी रखेगा। सोमवार को कृषि बजट की तैयारियों को लेकर आयोजित बैठक में इस बाबत स्पष्ट संकेत दिए गए। कृषि मंत्री बादल की अध्यक्षता में हुई बैठक में कृषि विभाग की तमाम चालू योजनाओं को अगले वित्तवर्ष में भी जारी रखने पर सहमति बनी।  मंत्री ने भगवान बिरसा मुंडा और जयपाल सिंह मुंडा के नाम पर कुछ नई योजनाओं को शुरू करने के बाबत अधिकारियों से सुझाव भी मांगे। इस वित्तवर्ष किसानों की कर्ज माफी योजना के तहत बजट में 2000 करोड़ का प्रावधान कर कर्जमाफी की प्रक्रिया शुरू भी कर दी गई। किसानों के कर्ज को लेकर हुए आकलन में यह बात सामने आई कि किसानों पर करीब 5800 करोड़ का कर्ज है।  इतने बड़े कर्ज की वजह से तमाम किसान एनपीए के दायरे में भी आ चुके हैं। इसके आधार पर यह तय माना जा रहा था कि कर्जमाफी योजना को अगले वित्तीय वर्ष में भी जारी रखा जा सकता है। बैठक में कृषि सचिव अबु बकर सिद्दीक  संयुक्त सचिव सुनील कुमार सिन्हा  कृषि निदेशक निशा उरांव  पशुपालन निदेशक नैंसी सहाय  बागवानी निदेशक वरुण रंजन सहित अन्य अधिकारी उपस्थित थे।  आदिवासी छात्रों को ऑक्सफोर्ड और कैंब्रिज में पढऩे के लिए छात्रवृत्ति देगी सरकार  राज्य के आदिवासी युवा अब मरांग गोमके जयपाल सिंह मुंडा पारदेशीय छात्रवृत्ति योजना के माध्यम से यूनिवर्सिटी ऑफ ऑक्सफोर्ड तथा कैम्ब्रिज जैसे बड़े विदेशी संस्थानों में शिक्षा पा सकेंगे। ऐसी छात्रवृत्ति योजना लागू करने वाला झारखंड देश का पहला राज्य है। इस छात्रवृत्ति योजना के माध्यम से आदिवासी युवकों को 22 विषयों में उच्च शिक्षा ग्रहण करने के अवसर प्राप्त होंगे।  राज्य सरकार का मानना है कि अलग झारखंड राज्य गठन के बाद भी झारखंड के लोगों को अपनी प्रतिभा निखारने का पर्याप्त अवसर नहीं मिल पाया। इसका मुख्य कारण गुणवत्तापूर्ण शिक्षा के सीमित अवसर का होना है। अब इस योजना के माध्यम से अनुसूचित जनजाति के 10 चयनित प्रतिभावान छात्र छात्राओं को प्रत्येक वर्ष विदेशों के चयनित उच्च शिक्षण संस्थानों में मास्टर डिग्री  एमफिल की पढ़ाई के लिए छात्रवृत्ति की सहायता दी जाएगी। ये छात्र छात्राएं मानव विज्ञान  कृषि  कला और संस्कृति  जलवायु परिवर्तन  अर्थशास्त्र  विधि  मीडिया एंड कम्युनिकेशन  पर्यटन समेत कुल 22 विषयों में एक और दो वर्ष के पाठ्यक्रम या शोध के क्षेत्र में उच्च शिक्षा प्राप्त कर सकेंगे।  इन्हें मिलेगा योजना का लाभ  मास्टर या एमफिल डिग्री के लिए अभ्यर्थी के पास न्यूनतम 55 फीसद अंकों के साथ स्नातक/ स्नातकोत्तर की डिग्री होनी अनिवार्य है। इसके अलावा संबंधित विषय में दो वर्ष का शिक्षण कार्य वांछनीय होगा। अनुभव वाले आवेदकों को प्राथमिकता दी जाएगी। उम्रसीमा 40 वर्ष तय की गई है। छात्रवृत्ति का लाभ पाने के लिए झारखंड राज्य का स्थानीय निवासी होना अनिवार्य है। आवेदक को इसके लिए जाति प्रमाण पत्र भी प्रस्तुत करना होगा। योजना का लाभ ऐसे ही आवेदकों को मिलेगा जिनकी संपूर्ण पारिवारिक आय 12 लाख प्रति वर्ष से कम हो। आवेदन के साथ आयकर रिटर्न की प्रति उपलब्ध कराना अनिवार्य है। एक माता पिता के एक से अधिक बच्चे योजना के पात्र नहीं होंगे। योजना अंतर्गत भारत सरकार या राज्य सरकार के मंत्री के बच्चे को इसका लाभ नहीं मिलेगा।  इन सुविधाओं का मिलेगा लाभ  चयनित छात्रों को शिक्षण शुल्क के अलावा पुस्तक  आवश्यक उपकरण  वार्षिक अनुरक्षण भत्ता  वीजा शुल्क  हवाई यात्रा खर्च  स्वास्थ्य बीमा का प्रीमियम आदि के लिए राशि मिलेगी। शिक्षण शुल्क का भुगतान संबंधित विश्वविद्यालय को एवं अन्य खर्च का भुगतान डीबीटी के माध्यम से छात्रों के बैंक एकाउंट में होगा।  शॉर्ट मे जानें सभी बड़ी खबरें और पायें ई पेपर ऑडियो न्यूज़ और अन्य सर्विस  डाउनलोड जागरण ऐप

line: prime minister s office  english rendering of pm s address at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci    namaskar   ficci president sangitareddyji  secretary general dilipchenoyji  friends in indian industry  ladies and gentlemen    in the match of 20 20  we have seen a lot of things changing rapidly
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but the year 2020 has defeated all
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the nation and the entire world went through so many ups and downs thatwhen we ll think of the corona period a few years later  perhaps we won t believe it
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but  it s good that the situation which deteriorated so fast  is improving swiftly also
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: when this cycle of pandemic began in february march  we were up against an unknown enemy
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: there were many uncertainties
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: whether it’s the production  logistics  or revival of the economy  there were many issues
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: everybody had this question in his mind  how long will it continue and how the situation will improve
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the entire mankind of the world was grappling with these questions  challenges and concerns
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but now in the month of december  the situation has changed a lot
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have the answer as well as the roadmap
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the indicators of the economy are very encouraging
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the lessons that the country learnt during the crisis have firmed up its resolve for the future
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: and  indeed  a huge credit for it goes to entrepreneurs  the young generation  farmers  industrialists and all the people of india
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   there is always a history and a lesson associated with global pandemic
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the country which manages to save more and more of its citizens during such a pandemic has the power to rebound with the same speed
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: during this pandemic  india gave utmost priority to the lives of its citizens  saved the lives of most of the people and the result is there before the country and the world as well
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the world is surprised at the way india has worked collectively in the last few months  made policies and decisions and brought the situation under control
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the faith of the world towards india in the last six years has been further strengthened in the last few months
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: whether it is fdi or fpi  foreign investors have made record investments in india and are continuously doing so
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   today  every citizen of the country is committed to make the atmanirbhar india campaign a success and is working towards local for vocal
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this is a living example of how much confidence the country has on the capability of its private sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: india’s private sector can not only meet our domestic needs  but can also establish its identity globally forcefully
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   the atmanirbhar india campaign is also a medium to make quality products in india and make indian industry more competitive
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: and when i got the opportunity to address from the ramparts of red fort in 2014 for the first time  i had said that our goal should be zero defect  zero effect
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   experience has it that the policies in the past have protected inefficiency in several sectors and have prevented new experiments  whereas  the atmanirbhar india campaign encourages efficiency in every sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: emphasis is being given on sectors where india has long term comparative advantage and sunrise and technology based industries
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we want that our infant industries also become more strong and independent in future
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: therefore  you must have noticed  another important step has been taken
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: a production linked incentive scheme has been launched in the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this scheme is for the industries where india has the capacity to become a global champion
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: anyone will be entitled to incentives who will perform  who will work with efficiency and who will make india self reliant in the sector he is involved in
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends  we often see a paradox whether it is in life or governance
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: a confident person does not hesitate in giving space to others
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but the one who is insecure is afraid to give opportunities to the people around him too
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this is often the case with governments
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the government backed by the overwhelming support and confidence of the people has its own confidence and dedication  and therefore  the government is committed to realize the mantra of sabkasaath  sabkavikas  sabkavishwas
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: a decisive government always strives to remove obstacles for others
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: a decisive government always tries to contribute maximum towards the society and the nation
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: a decisive and self confident government also does not want all the control with itself and does not let others do anything
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: you all have been witness to this approach of the previous governments and the country has been its victim
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: what was the thinking – the government will do everything
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: whether it is the manufacture of watches  scooters  tvs  or even bread and cake  the government used to make everything
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have seen the ruin brought about by this approach
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: on the contrary  a visionary and decisive government encourages all the stakeholders so that they can realize their potential fully
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   in the last six years  india has seen the government which is only committed to realize the dreams of the 130 crore people of the country and is encouraging people in all sectors
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  india is endeavouring to increase the partnership of every stakeholder in every sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: with this approach  the all round reforms have been undertaken in sectors ranging from manufacturing to msme  agriculture to infrastructure  from tech industry to taxation and from real estate to regulatory easing
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: in india  the corporate tax is the most competitive in the world today
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  india is among the few countries in the world that boast of faceless assessments and faceless appeals
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: leaving behind the era of inspector raj and tax terrorism  india is moving ahead by relying on the capabilities of the entrepreneurs of our country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: in a way  a tradition of countless opportunities has been created in mining  defence  space  andinvestment in most of the sectors
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: emphasis is being given on multimodal connectivity to make logistics competitive in the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   when a sector grows in a vibrant economy it has direct bearing on other sectors
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but can you imagine what will happen if a wall is created between the industries unnecessarily
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: no industry will be able to grow according to its strength
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: even if an industry grows somehow  its effect will not percolate down to other sectors
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: such walls in different sectors have caused tremendous damage to the people and the economy of the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the reforms that are being undertaken in the country are meant to dismantle such walls
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the recent agriculture reforms are part of this series
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have seen such walls in the agriculture sector and allied sectors like agriculture infrastructure  food processing  storage or cold chains
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: now these walls are being dismantled and all obstacles removed
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: by removing these walls and after these reforms  the farmers will get new markets  new options  the cold storage infrastructure will become modern  and they will benefit largely from technology
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: it will entail huge investment in the agri sector which will benefit the farmers of my country and who lives on small pieces of land
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the economy of our country does not need walls in different sectors  but bridges so that they can support each other
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   there is an excellent example of how reforms have been undertaken in a planned and integrated approach to dismantle such walls in the last few years
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: it is the financial inclusion of millions of people of the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: from banking exclusion  we are now included in the most inclusive countries
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: you have also been witness to how aadhaar was given constitutional protection in india by removing all barriers
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we linked unbanked to banks
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we connected the poorest of the poor by making available cheap mobile data and cheap phones to them
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: only then the country got the trinity of jam – jan dhan accounts  aadhaar and mobile
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   today  the world’s largest direct benefit transfer systemexists in the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: you must have read a recent report of an international journal which praised this indigenous system handsomely
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: during the corona period  citizens of many countries were facing difficulty in transferring money as they were dependent on cheques and postal departments  whereas india could transfer money in the crores of accounts through a click of button in no time  and that too when banks were closed and there was lockdown in the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: many prominent experts in the international world are now saying that other countries should also learn from this model of india
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: who will not be proud to read and hear this   friends   there was a time when some people doubted how india would be able to deliver technology to its ordinary citizens in an environment of illiteracy and poverty
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but india has done this and done with a lot of success and it will continue to do so
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  on the upi platform alone  there are transactionsworth about four lakhcrore rupees every month
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: transactionsworth four lakhcrore rupees and new records are being created every month
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  digital payments have become possible in villages and even on small street stalls
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: india s industry has to move forward by realizing this strength of the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   as we have grown up watching the atmosphere of villages and small towns in tv or films  it is natural to have a different perception about them
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the physical distance between cities and villages has never been as much as the distance of perspective has been
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: for some people  the village means a place where it is difficult to commute  where there are very few facilities  very little development and backwardness is all around
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but if you go to rural or semi rural areas today  you will get a very different view  you will find a new hope  a new confidence
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today s rural india is undergoing a major change
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: did you know that the number of active internet users in rural india has exceeded cities  did you know that more than half of india s start ups are in our tier 2  tier 3 cities  about 98 per cent of the settlements in the country have been connected with the pradhanmantrigraminsadakyojana
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: it means that the villagers are now increasingly connecting with markets  schools  hospitals and other facilities
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the aspiration of the villagers is increasing  they want socio economic mobility
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the government on its part is engaged in fulfilling these aspirations
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: now  take for example  the recently launched pm wani scheme
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: under the scheme  a network of public wi fi hotspots will be created across the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this will lead to a comprehensive expansion of connectivity in villages
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: i will urge all entrepreneurs to use this opportunity to participate in better connectivity efforts in rural and semi rural areas
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: it is certain that villages and small cities will support the growth of the 21st century india
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: therefore  entrepreneurs like you should not lose the opportunity of making investment in villages and small towns
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the investment that you make will open new doors to our agriculture sector  for the brothers and sisters living in our villages
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   india has been steadily working in the last few years to strengthen the agriculture sector of the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  india s agricultural sector has been more vibrant than ever before
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  the farmers of india have the option to sell their crops outside the mandis as well
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  not only the mandis are being modernized in india  the farmers are being given the option to buy and sell crops on digital platforms
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the goal of all these efforts is to increase the income of the farmers and they become prosperous
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: when the farmers of the country prosper  the country will also prosper
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: i will give you another example of how the agriculture sector was being handled earlier
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   earlier  ethanol was given the preference in our country and it used to be imported  whereas the sugarcane farmers were upset that they could not sell their sugarcane or they did not get the arrears of thousands of crores of rupees in time
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we changed this situation
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have promoted the production of ethanol in the country itself
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: earlier when sugar or jiggery was made  sometimes the prices of sugar would fall  the farmers did not get the money  sometimes the prices of sugar increased  the consumer suffered  that is  there was no system in place
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: on the other hand  we used to import petrol for our cars and scooters  which ethanol could also do
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: now there is 10 per cent blending of ethanol in petrol in the country
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: imagine the change it will bring about
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this will not only increase the income of sugarcane farmers  but will also create new employment opportunities
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   today  when i am among the senior industrialists  i would like to say categorically that unfortunately the private sector investment in agriculture in our country did not happen as much as it should have been
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: this sector was not explored as much by the private sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have had the problems of cold storage
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the supply chains have been working in a very limited way without the support of the private sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: you have also seen that there is a shortage of fertilizer
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: you also know how much it is imported
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the central government is continuously working to address several such challenges of the agriculture sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: but it requires both your interest and investment
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: i believe that many agriculture companies are doing a good job  but that is not enough
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the less will be the loss to crops and the farmers income will also increase if more support of the modern technology  the modern business techniques are available to the farmers who grow crops  fruits and vegetables and the investment that we make according to their requirements
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: today  there is a huge scope for agro based industries in the rural sector
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: whatever the earlier policies may have been  but today s policies are very conducive to developing a rural agro based economy
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: with policy and intentions  the government is fully committed to the interests of the farmers
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   we have to invest energy in finding ways to make agriculture  service  manufacturing and social sectors complement each other
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: organizations like ficci have to be both a bridge and inspiration in this regard
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: msmes have been empowered by the government  you can multiply this strength
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we all have to work together with a goal to strengthen the local value and supply chain and how to expand india s role in the global supply chain
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: india has market  manpower and also the capability to work in mission mode
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: even in this era of pandemic  we have seen how every step of indiatowards self sufficiency benefits the whole world
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: our pharma sector did not allow the global supply chain to be affected even in difficult times
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: now that india is moving ahead in vaccine manufacturing  it will give a protective cover to millions of lives in india  and there is a new hope in many countries of the world
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: friends   we are all familiar with one mantra and it is also necessary for our lives
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: it is said  तन्मे मन  शिवसंकल्प मस्तु  i
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: e
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: my mind should have exquisite resolutions
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we have to move ahead with this spirit
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the country s goals  resolutions and policies are crystal clear
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: india s intentions on reforms  whether it is infrastructure or policy  are firm
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: whatever speedbreaker came in the form of the epidemic  we are now going beyond that
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: now  we all have to work harder than before with new beliefs
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: we now have to move forward in the new decade with trust and self confidence
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: the country will celebrate its 75th years of independence in 2022
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: ficci has also played a major role in the country s march towards growth since the freedom movement
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: even 100 years of ficci are not too far away
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: at this important stage  you have to further expand and broaden your role of nation building
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: your efforts will give momentum to the atmanirbhar india campaign
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: your efforts will take the mantra of local for vocal to the entire world
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: finally  i congratulate dr
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: sangitareddyji for her excellent tenure as president
headline: text of pm s address  at the 93rd annual general meeting of ficci

line: at the same time  i convey my best wishes to udayshankarji for the future

line: usmnt defender richards leaves bayern munich for hoffenheim loan  the highly rated 20 year old is staying in germany but will be seeing out the season away from the reigning bundesliga champions  highly rated bayern munich defender chris richards is to see out the 2020 21 campaign on loan at hoffenheim  with the united states international going in search of more regular game time

line: they feel the perfect landing spot has been found  with the talented youngster linking up with a domestic rival through to the end of the season

line: together we decided chris will use the months in hoffenheim for the next stage of his development

line: we re sure tsg will get a lot from him
headline: usmnt defender richards leaves bayern munich for hoffenheim loan

line: richards added on taking on a new challenge   i m looking forward to taking the next steps in my development in hoffenheim
headline: usmnt defender richards leaves bayern munich for hoffenheim loan

line: it s important i pick up more match practice in the bundesliga now
headline: usmnt defender richards leaves bayern munich for hoffenheim loan

line: i have big goals and i d like to progress at fc bayern
headline: usmnt defender richards leaves bayern munich for hoffenheim loan

line: richards has been on bayern’s books since completing a switch from fc dallas in 2018

line: he has taken in 38 appearances for the club’s second team in the third tier of german football  four outings in the bundesliga  three in the champions league and one in the dfl supercup

line: hoffenheim are now preparing to offer more precious minutes in his ongoing development  with a reunion being taken in with sebastian hoeness – the former coach of bayern’s u23 side

line: chris is a strong and very fast defender who has already started playing despite the outstanding competition in the bayern squad   hoffenheim’s director of professional football  alexander rosen  told his team’s official website

line: new delhi  the narendra modi government’s first union budget since the pandemic has walked a tight line in ensuring that the indian economy is steered out a historical contraction in gdp while trying to find more financial resources to fight the economic effects of the lockdown

line: there is no ‘bad news’ in the union budget 2021 – a euphemism for the fact that there is no dreaded covid 19 cess or a hike in income tax rates – but at the same time the average consumer has not been left with more money in her pocket

line: नई दिल्ली  सोशल मीडिया का इस्तेमाल इन दिनों ज्यादातर लोग करते हैं। हालांकि इसके जितने फायदे हैं तो उतने ही नुकसान हैं। सोशल मीडिया आज लोगों को ट्रोल करने का  उन पर भद्दे और अश्लील कमेंट करने का एक जरिया बन चुका है। इसका सबसे ज्यादा असर सितारों पर पड़ता है। बॉलीवुड सेलेब्स पब्लिक फिगर होते हैं। ऐसे में जितना उन्हें लोगों द्वारा प्यार मिलता है तो उतना ही उन्हें ट्रोल्स का भी सामना करना पड़ता है।  पहली मंजिल से गिरा 6 साल का बच्चा  sonu sood ने कुछ इस तरह बचाई जान  घरवाले बोले  वह इकलौता मसीहा है  बॉलीवुड एक्ट्रेस रकुल प्रीत सिंह को भी एक यूजर ने शॉर्ट ड्रेस के लिए करने की कोशिश की थी। यूजर ने एक अश्लील कमेंट किया था। जिसका एक्ट्रेस ने मुंहतोड़ जवाब दिया था। दरअसल  रकुल प्रीत सिंह सोशल मीडिया पर काफी एक्टिव रहती हैं। वह अपनी तस्वीरें फैंस के साथ शेयर करती रहती हैं। ऐसे में एक यूजर ने उनकी तस्वीर पर भद्दा कमेंट किया था।  hrithik roshan को भारी पड़ा था पत्नी सुजैन से अलग होना  तलाक के बाद चुकाए 380 करोड़   ये वाक्या दो साल पुराना है जब एक्ट्रेस ने अपनी एक शॉर्ट ड्रेस पहने हुए तस्वीर शेयर की थी। जिसपर एक यूजर ने कमेंट कर लिखा  कार में सेशन के बाद एक्ट्रेस अपने पैंट पहनना भूल गईं। सेलेब्स का ट्रोल होना वैसे तो आम बात है लेकिन इस कमेंट को रकुल इग्नोर नहीं कर पाईं। उन्होंने शख्स को मुंहतोड़ जवाब देते हुए लिखा   लगता है कि तुम्हारी मां ने भी कार में कई सेशन किया है तभी तुम इसमें एक्सपर्ट हो। अपनी मां से कहो कि कार सेशेन की डिटेल देने के साथ साथ तुम्हें थोड़ी अक्ल भी दें। जब तक ऐसे लोग रहेंगे औरतें सुरक्षित नहीं रहेंगी। सिर्फ बराबरी की बहस करने से सुरक्षा नहीं मिलेगी । उनका ये ट्वीट काफी वायरल हुआ था।

line: emi  personal loan  home loan लेने वाले ध्‍यान दें  सुप्रीम कोर्ट में लोन मोरेटोरियम पर होन वाली है सुनवाई  emi  personal loan  home loan लेने वालों के लिए फिर से महत्‍वपूर्ण सूचना है कि लोन मोरेटोरियम के मामले में सोमवार को सुप्रीम कोर्ट में सुनवाई का अगला दौर शुरू होने जा रहा है। कोरोना महामारी के मद्देनजर टर्म लोन पर ब्याज की मियाद बढ़ाने और ब्याज पर छूट देने की याचिका पर सुनवाई के दौरान आज भी कई दलीलें पेश की गईं। ब्याज माफी के खिलाफ केंद्र ने सुप्रीम कोर्ट से कहा कि यदि ब्याज सभी प्रकार के ऋणों पर छूट दी जाती है  तो माफ की गई राशि 6 ​​लाख करोड़ रुपये से अधिक होगी  इस कारण ब्याज माफी पर भी विचार नहीं किया गया। यह बैंकों के निवल मूल्य का एक बड़ा हिस्सा मिटा देगा  बैंकों के अस्तित्व के बारे में गंभीर सवाल उठाएगा। अकेले एसबीआई के लिए  ब्याज माफी बैंकों के निवल मूल्य का आधा हिस्सा मिटा देगी। जमाकर्ताओं के लिए निरंतर भुगतान महत्वपूर्ण  प्रत्येक उधारकर्ता के लिए लगभग 8
headline: note to the national   n emi  personal loan  home loan  next hearing in the supreme court on loan moratorium on december 14

line: 5 जमाकर्ता हैं। लोन मोरेटोरियम की अवधि बढ़ाने व ब्याज पर ब्याज में छूट की याचिकाओं पर सुप्रीम कोर्ट में सुनवाई के दौरान केंद्र सरकार ने कहा कि मोरेटोरियम अवधि में सभी लोनधारकों को ब्याज पर ब्याज में छूट देना अव्यावहारिक होता। इस छूट से छह लाख करोड़ रुपये का बोझ पड़ता और बैंकों की नेटवर्थ का अच्छा खासा हिस्सा इसमें चला जाता। कोरोना के कारण आर्थिक चुनौतियों को देखते हुए मार्च से अगस्त के दौरान लोन की किस्तें टालने  लोन मोरेटोरियम  का फैसला किया गया था। केंद्र की ओर से सॉलिसिटर जनरल तुषार मेहता ने जस्टिस अशोक भूषण  आरएस रेड्डी और एमआर शाह की पीठ को बताया कि अर्थव्यवस्था पर पड़ने वाले असर को देखते हुए ही लोगों को किस्त चुकाने से छूट दी गई थी  लेकिन ब्याज पर छूट नहीं दी गई।  supreme court adjourns to december 14  the hearing on the pleas seeking an extension of the loan moratorium period and waiver of interest on interest on term loans in view of the covid 19 pandemic pic
headline: note to the national   n emi  personal loan  home loan  next hearing in the supreme court on loan moratorium on december 14

line: com/kunknq6vvm — ani   ani  december 9  2020  ब्‍याज पर ब्‍याज से मिली थी छूट  केंद्र सरकार ने दो करोड़ रुपये तक के पर्सनल व एमएसएमई लोन के लिए मोरेटोरियम अवधि में ब्याज पर ब्याज में छूट का एलान किया था। लोन मोरेटोरियम का लाभ नहीं लेने वाले कर्जधारकों को भी साधारण ब्याज एवं चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज के अंतर के बराबर की राशि उनके खाते में दी गई है। कोरोना संकट के मद्देनजर कर्जधारकों को बैंक से लिए दो करोड़ रुपये तक के कर्ज पर 31 अगस्त तक किस्त चुकाने की बाध्यता से राहत दी गई थी। अवधि की समाप्ति के बाद बैंकों द्वारा कर्जधारकों से छूट की अवधि के ब्याज पर ब्याज वसूले के मामले को सुप्रीम कोर्ट देख रहा है।  9 दिसंबर की सुनवाई के मुख्‍य अंश    शीर्ष अदालत covid 19 महामारी के मद्देनजर रियल एस्टेट और बिजली की मांग सहित विभिन्न निकायों की दलीलों की सुनवाई कर रही है।      अगर बैंकों को यह बोझ उठाना पड़ता है  तो यह जरूरी है कि वे अपने निवल मूल्य का एक बड़ा और प्रमुख हिस्सा मिटा दें  अधिकांश उधारदाताओं को अस्वीकार्य और उनके बहुत ही जीवित रहने पर बहुत गंभीर प्रश्नचिह्न खड़ा करते हैं।    सुप्रीम कोर्ट बुधवार को ऋण स्थगन या ब्याज माफी मामले में सुनवाई जारी रखेगा।    जस्टिस अशोक भूषण  आरएस रेड्डी और एमआर शाह की खंडपीठ ने मंगलवार को मामले की सुनवाई की।    केंद्र द्वारा सूचित किया गया कि अगर सभी ऋणों पर ब्याज माफ करने पर विचार करना है और छह महीने की नैतिकता अवधि के लिए उधारकर्ताओं की सभी श्रेणियों को अग्रिम की घोषणा की गई है covid 19 महामारी के मद्देनजर rbi द्वारा  तब राशि की राशि 6 लाख करोड़ रुपये से अधिक होगी।  तुषार मेहता ने यह कहा    मेहता ने कहा कि अब तक बड़े कर्जदारों का संबंध है  आरबीआई ने के वी कामथ की अध्यक्षता में एक विशेषज्ञ समिति नियुक्त की जिसने विभिन्न क्षेत्र के उधारकर्ताओं को 26 श्रेणियों में अलग कर दिया और ऐसे पैरामीटर दिए जिनके भीतर बैंकों को खातों के पुनर्गठन के लिए निर्देशित किया गया था।    मेहता ने कहा कि यद्यपि ऋण लेने वालों का सटीक प्रतिशत देना संभव नहीं हो सकता है  जिन्होंने अधिस्थगन का लाभ नहीं उठाया है और समय पर किश्तें जमा की हैं  लगभग ऐसी कक्षा 50 प्रतिशत से अधिक होगी। मेहता ने कहा कि संकटग्रस्त छोटे कर्जदारों को राहत देते हुए  केंद्र ने फैसला किया कि छह महीने की अधिस्थगन अवधि के दौरान चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज की छूट पर राहत उन उधारकर्ताओं की सबसे कमजोर श्रेणी तक सीमित होगी  जिन्होंने 2 करोड़ रुपये तक का ऋण लिया था। उन्होंने कहा कि आरबीआई ने 6 अगस्त को अपने सर्कुलर में बड़े कर्जदारों  1500 करोड़ रुपये और उससे अधिक के लोन अकाउंट होने और बड़े कर्जदारों के रूप में नहीं  को वर्गीकृत किया।    मेहता ने केंद्र द्वारा छोटे और मध्यम आकार के व्यापार / msmes के लिए सेक्टर विशिष्ट राहत उपायों को भी बताया  जिसमें रेस्तरां और होटल जैसे सेक्टर शामिल हैं। उन्होंने कहा कि केंद्र ने 3 लाख करोड़ रुपये की आपातकालीन क्रेडिट लिंक्ड गारंटी स्कीम  eclgs  को ब्याज दर से कम दर पर अतिरिक्त क्रेडिट प्रदान करने और 100  जमानत नहीं देने का वादा किया है। उन्होंने कहा कि इस योजना को रेस्तरां और होटल क्षेत्रों सहित सत्ताईस covid 19 प्रभावित क्षेत्रों में उच्च वित्तीय सीमाओं के साथ विस्तारित किया गया है।    मेहता ने कहा कि प्रत्येक ऋण खाते के लिए भारतीय बैंकिंग प्रणाली में लगभग 8
headline: note to the national   n emi  personal loan  home loan  next hearing in the supreme court on loan moratorium on december 14

line: 5 जमा खाते हैं और केंद्र सरकार द्वारा पहले से दी गई विभिन्न वित्तीय राहतों पर प्रकाश डाला गया है। उन्होंने कहा कि आगे चलकर समग्र आर्थिक परिदृश्य के लिए हानिकारक हो सकता है  राष्ट्र की अर्थव्यवस्था या बैंकिंग क्षेत्र वित्तीय बाधाओं के परिणामस्वरूप लेने में सक्षम नहीं हो सकता है।    25 सितंबर को इंडियन बैंक्स एसोसिएशन द्वारा दायर हलफनामे का उल्लेख करते हुए  एसजी तुषार मेहता ने कहा कि भारतीय स्टेट बैंक ने कहा है कि छह महीने की मोहलत के दौरान उधारकर्ताओं से मिलने वाली ब्याज राशि 88 078 करोड़ रुपये  लगभग  होगी  जबकि ब्याज देय होगा उक्त अवधि के दौरान जमाकर्ता 75 157 करोड़ रुपये  लगभग  काम करते हैं।  जानिये 8 दिसंबर की सुनवाई की सारी अपडेट    सॉलिसिटर जनरल तुषार मेहता ने शीर्ष अदालत को बताया कि छह महीने की ऋण स्थगन अवधि के दौरान ब्याज की पूरी छूट के साथ एक लागत जुड़ी है।    सॉलिसिटर जनरल ने कहा   अगर हम ब्याज माफ कर देते हैं  तो इससे जुड़ी लागत आ जाती है। या तो बैंक इसे ले लेते हैं या सरकार को। सरकार नहीं कर सकती और जमाकर्ता नहीं कर सकते।     कोई नहीं कह रहा है कुछ नहीं किया गया है। ऐसा नहीं है कि कुछ भी नहीं किया गया है। सबमिशन कुछ और है जो चरण उद्योगों के माध्यम से किए जाने की आवश्यकता है।    आरबीआई द्वारा सर्कुलर जारी किए गए हैं। लेकिन कुछ शर्तें हैं जिनके द्वारा आरबीआई द्वारा दिए गए लाभ को हटा दिया जाता है और बहुमत से लाभ प्राप्त होता है।    भले ही इस साल अगस्त में रिस्ट्रक्चरिंग सर्कुलर सामने आया हो  लेकिन दिक्कतें जारी हैं। इसलिए अधिक उपायों की आवश्यकता है। 31 मार्च का मतलब है कि बहुत से लोगों को बाहर रखा जाएगा।    सॉलिसिटर जनरल तुषार मेहता ने कहा  अभी तक जनता को दी गई राहत की मात्रा और उसके प्रभाव पर प्रभाव देखें। अगर छूट दी जाती है  तो 6 लाख करोड़ का नुकसान होगा। इस प्रकार छूट पर विचार नहीं किया गया था लेकिन केवल किस्तों का भुगतान टाल दिया गया था।    भारतीय बैंकिंग प्रणाली के लिए इस समय  एक ऋणदाता के लिए आठ जमाकर्ता हैं।    6 लाख करोड़ रुपये का ब्याज माफ करना अकल्पनीय है। कई द्वारा गलत तरीके से लागू किए गए मोराटोरियम। यह टालना है  छूट नहीं। लगभग आधे उधारकर्ताओं को यह पता था  और उन्होंने अधिस्थगन का लाभ नहीं उठाया।    किसी ने भी इस तथ्य को स्वीकार नहीं किया कि अधिकांश खर्च सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य और व्यय में जाता है। इस तरह की राहत अक्सर प्रत्येक मंत्रालय से देखी जाती है। केंद्र ने जो भी कदम उठाए थे  उठाए हैं।    ndma  नेशनल डिजास्टर मैनेजमेंट अथॉरिटी  ने इस पहलू को व्यक्त किया है कि वित्त मंत्रालय इस पर कॉल कर सकता है या नहीं और वे इस बात पर सहमत हुए हैं कि मंत्रालय कॉल कर सकता है।    मध्यम और निम्न मध्यम वर्ग हितों की माफी चाहता था और अन्य बड़े कॉर्पोरेट दिग्गज हैं जिनके पास विरासत के मुद्दे हैं। उनके पास covid से पहले के मुद्दे थे और कोविद ने शायद अपने मुद्दों को बढ़ा दिया था।  बार और बेंच से इनपुट्स      कामथ समिति में क्रेडाई के सलाहकार थे  जो भी श्री सिब्बल ने यहां दिखाया  वह कामथ समिति को भी दिखाया गया। 3 लाख करोड़ रुपये की आपातकालीन ऋण लिंक योजना शुरू की गई।     2 प्रतिशत ब्याज सबवेंशन स्कीम की घोषणा  रु। 20 000 करोड़ का क्रेडिट ब्याज माफी कभी हल नहीं थी। पुराने डिफॉल्टर्स का covid से कोई लेना देना नहीं है।    ऋण खातों के पुनर्गठन और दी गई राहत को अनुकूलित करके मामला वित्त मंत्रालय या आरबीआई के लिए संभव नहीं है।    अधिकांश याचिकाकर्ता संघों की विरासत के मुद्दे पूर्व covid कारकों के कारण हैं। बिजली क्षेत्र के लिए जो कुछ भी किया जा सकता था  किया गया है।  cnbc tv18 से इनपुट     उधारकर्ताओं को चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज का भुगतान करना पड़ता है क्योंकि इसकी एक श्रृंखला है। कुछ लोगों ने स्थगन लिया  लेकिन हमें उधारकर्ताओं को अपनी निधि से सभी के लिए ब्याज देना पड़ा और उन्हें उच्च और शुष्क नहीं छोड़ सकते क्योंकि हम अधिस्थगन लेने वालों को लाभ दे रहे थे।   बार और बेंच से इनपुट्स   supreme court adjourned to tomorrow the hearing on the pleas seeking an extension of the loan moratorium period and waiver of interest on interest on term loans  in view of the covid 19 pandemic pic

line: new delhi  india   february 1   prime minister narendra modi on monday assured his israeli counterpart benjamin netanyahu of punishing the perpetrators of the minor bomb blast that took place near the israeli embassy here on january 29
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: pm modi further said that india gives high importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and embassy
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: according to an official statement by the prime minister s office  during a telephonic conversation pm modi assured his counterpart that india accords the highest importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and premises  and would deploy all its resources to find and punish the perpetrators
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: both leaders expressed satisfaction about the close coordination between indian and israeli security agencies in this context   the statement said
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the leaders also spoke on fighting against the coronavirus pandemic together
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the two leaders also briefed each other about the progress of the fight against covid 19 pandemic in their respective countries  and discussed possibilities of further collaboration in this area   the pmo added
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: कितने शेयर और क्या रहेगी फेसवैल्यू रेलटेल के आईपीओ में 8 71 53 369 इक्विटी शेयर रहेंगे। इसमें से 5 लाख इक्विटी शेयर कंपनी के कर्मचारियों के लिए रिजर्व हैं। फेस वेल्यू 10 रुपये प्रति शेयर होगी। निवेशक न्यूनतम 155 शेयरों के लिए बोली लगा सकते हैं। उसके बाद 155 के मल्टीप्लाई में बोली लगाई जा सकती है। इस ऑफर से मिली धनराशि में से कुछ भी कंपनी को नहीं मिलेगा  सारी राशि सरकार को जाएगी। icici सिक्योरिटीज  idbi कैपिटल मार्केट्स एंड सिक्योरिटीज और sbi कैपिटल मार्केट्स इस इश्यू के बुक रनिंग लीड मैनेजर हैं।  प्राइस बैंड और लॉट साइज रेलटेल के आईपीओ के तहत प्राइस बैंड 93 94 रुपये प्रति शेयर तय किया गया है। इस आईपीओ के जरिए सरकार का लक्ष्य 819

line: 24 करोड़ रुपये जुटाने का है। हायर प्राइस बैंड में रिटेल इन्वेस्टर्स के लिए मिनिमम एप्लीकेशन साइज 14 570 रुपये है। अधिकतम 13 लॉट साइज के लिए बोली लगा सकते हैं।  शेयर अलोकेशन रेलटेल का आईपीओ 16 फरवरी को खुलेगा और 18 फरवरी को क्लोज होगा। शेयर अलोकेशन 23 फरवरी के आसपास होगा। इसके बाद 24 फरवरी को एसबीए अकाउंट से फंड्स की अनब्लॉकिंग होगी। पात्र निवेशकों को 24 या 25 फरवरी को शेयर मिलेंगे और स्टॉक 26 फरवरी को लिस्ट होगा।  ​रेलटेल के बारे में रेल टेल कॉर्पोरेशन ऑफ इंडिया इनफॉर्मेशन व कम्युनिकेशंस टेक्नोलॉजी  ict  इंफ्रास्ट्रक्चर प्रोवाइडर है। कंपनी आज के दौर में देश की सबसे बड़ी न्यूट्रल टेलिकॉम इंफ्रास्ट्रक्चर प्रोवाइडर कंपनियों में शामिल है। रेलटेल साल 2000 में शुरू की गई थी। यह रेल मंत्रालय के तहत काम करती है। इसके प्रोडक्ट और सर्विसेज में टेलिकॉम नेटवर्क सर्विसेज  टेलिकॉम इंफ्रास्ट्रक्चर सर्विसेज  डाटा सेंटर एंड होस्टिंग सर्विसेज और सिस्टम इंटीग्रेशन सर्विसेज शामिल हैं। कंपनी का उद्देश्य ट्रेनों के नियंत्रण संचालन  सुरक्षा और देश भर में ब्रॉडबैंड और मल्टी मीडिया नेटवर्क सुविधाएं उपलब्ध कराके अतिरिक्त आय अर्जित करना है।  रेलटेल के फाइनेंशियल्स रेलटेल 2007 वित्त वर्ष से ही प्रॉफिट में है और 2008 वित्त वर्ष से डिविडेंड दे रही है। 30 सितंबर 2020 को खत्म हुई तिमाही तक रेलटेल का कुल एसेट्स 2482 करोड़ के करीब था  जबकि रेवेन्यू 554 करोड़ रुपये के आस पास था। कंपनी का मुनाफा करीब 46 करोड़ रुपये रहा था

line: the union finance minister nirmala sitharaman has proposed in the budget to set up a a multi purpose seaweed park in tamil nadu as part of promoting seaweed cultivation
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: according to the minister  seaweed farming is an emerging sector with potential to transform the lives of coastal communities and will provide large employment and additional income
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: welcoming the initiative  a gopalakrishnan  director  central marine fisheries research institute  said the proposed park could be a multi purpose hub for a variety of economic activities related to seaweed farming  business development and bio prospecting
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: presently  seaweeds are being cultivated by hundreds of fishermen along the palk bay coast in tamil nadu
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: the proposal will help the fisherfolk and coastal entrepreneurs in the state  he said
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: the commercially exploited seaweed species in india mainly include kappaphycus alvarezii  gracilaria edulis  gelidiella acerosa  sargassum spp
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: and turbinaria spp
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: seaweeds are valued for commercial products such as karrageenan and agar besides being used for the production of polysaccharides  fertilizer  sludge and other high value products such as nutraceuticals and cosmeceuticals for use against various lifestyle diseases
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: k riji john  vice chancellor  kerala university of fisheries and ocean studies  said that the development of seaweed park would go a long way in addressing the nutritionally security of a large segment of undernourished and underprivileged marginal communities
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: india being a tropical belt  we have a number of economically important seaweed species which can be commercially exploited
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: the operation of this park needs to be extended to lakshadweep where there is high potential for seaweed farming which is still remain so under explored   he said
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: seaweeds are storehouse of essential amino acids  natural antioxidants  minerals and other micro nutrients
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: however  awareness of the advantages on the consumption of the seaweeds are not properly penetrated to our community  he added
headline: proposal of seaweed park in tn gets a thumbs up from industry

line: in yet another attempt to save loss making electricity distribution companies  discoms   the budget has provided for a reforms based and result linked scheme  with an outlay of about ₹3
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: 06 lakh crore over five years
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: it will assist discoms in infrastructure creation  including providing prepaid smart metering  feeder separation  and upgrading systems  finance minister nirmala sitharaman
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: reacting to the announcement   the distribution segment has been the weakest link in the electrical system and providing assistance for infrastructure creation while tying the support to financial improvements is vital for sustainability   association of power producers  app  said in a statement
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: the new scheme follows not only the ujwal discom assurance yojana  uday  scheme  which ran from 2015 to 2019 and aimed to reduce discoms’ debt levels and losses  but also the ₹90 000 crore liquidity infusion package launched last year to allow the debt laden discoms to borrow beyond the standard limits in the banking system
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: operational improvement   the central government this time is targeting operational improvement rather than just financial liquidity   said ankur agarwal  associate director  infrastructure and project finance at india ratings   research
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: the disbursal of funds  whether debt or grant  will likely be in tranches based on targets for financial performance  agarwal said
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: sudhir kumar  dgm and group head at care ratings said  the new scheme will help discoms improve their operational efficiency and reduce aggregate technical and commercial  at c  losses  but those are only one part of the dead weight chained to the discoms  he added
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: the other reason most discoms are steeped in losses is the gap between their average cost of supply and average realisable revenue  acs arr
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: state governments  which also control most discoms  often subsidise electricity to consumers but delay the release of both the subsidy amount to the discom and even their bill payments for electricity used  kumar said
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: this has severely stressed the cash flow of the discoms
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: while the new scheme can mainly address at c losses  it can’t address the acs arr gap  except perhaps that prepaid meters might incentivise government buildings to pay their bills on time   kumar added
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: the distribution companies across the country are monopolies  either government or private   sitharaman said
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: a framework will be put in place to give consumers alternatives to choose from among more than one distribution company
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: the app has welcomed this move  saying that  competition in the distribution segment will improve quality of power and bring down retail tariffs
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: competition essentially requires privatisation of distribution business by roping in a private partner using franchisee or a collection agent model  agarwal said
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: obviously  the move will face resistance from existing monopolies and this remains the biggest reform for the next decade   he said
headline: a performance linked helping hand for discoms
a performance linked helping hand for discoms

line: it wasn’t slick marketing campaigns or some exotic and newfound rate of travel  not even the electric starter or air conditioning  or even in vehicle entertainment systems that popularized the fledging motorcar more than a century ago
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: it was the environment and concern for human health that enabled the car to replace the horse as the transport vehicle of choice for moving people and cargo
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: urban areas faced major health crises as horse manure and urine turned roadways into open sewers  mixing to form a sticky gunk to be tracked into people’s homes and places of business
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: when the mess in the streets dried  it became dust that was inhaled
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: people were sick and dying
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: and so were the horses
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: it wasn’t enough that in 1900 in new york city  horses were leaving behind 2
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: 5 million pounds of manure and 60 000 gallons of urine every day
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: and 15 000 horses a year were dying on new york streets  and those carcasses had to be dealt with
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: think banning certain transportation devices is a new idea  think again
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: new york city officials considered banning horses and did a study that revealed that not doing so was costing  100 million a year
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: extreme e car in pre season testing session  riding to the rescue was the newfangled motor car  seen as a much cleaner way to move people and product
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: of course  the motorcar had to prove its worth  so there were well publicized long distance durability drives and even races in which various automakers sought to prove their products to be superior
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: and here  more than a century later  we go again  except this time it is the motorcar itself that is seen as a health hazard  and not only from the emission from its engines but from the inattention of its drivers
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: this time  riding to the rescue are electric batteries and motors  and even  we’re told  cars that will drive themselves and that will be programmed not to crash
headline: like the first  second automotive revolution’s triggered by environment and health concerns

line: of course  such vehicles need to prove their practicality  so here we go yet again  with a need for long distance durability drives and even races to prove the technology

line: san francisco  feb 2  ians  the us smartphone market saw a six per cent year on year decline in sales in q4 2020  despite a record high iphone sales  as covid 19 continued to impact the economy  said a new report
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: apple and samsung were the only original equipment manufacturers  oems  to see positive growth in the quarter  thanks to new launches and a strong demand for premium devices during the holiday season  industry tracker counterpoint research said on monday
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: q4 2020 was a particularly challenging quarter for many oems  especially those who manufacture devices for the prepaid and lower price band markets   jeff fieldhack  us mobile devices and carrier strategies director at counterpoint  said in a statement
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: with covid 19 still showing record number of us cases  there were over 10
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: 7 million unemployed people at the end of 2020
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: the economic effect of this can be seen in the negative growth of many oems in the quarter   fieldhack said
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: apple grew 14 per cent year on year in q4 despite a delayed iphone 12 launch while samsung gained five per cent year on year
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: given this strong demand for new iphones and supply shortages in q4 2020  we expect sales to spill over into q1 2021   research analyst maurice klaehne added
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: samsung had a strong quarter as well  mainly due to the success of the samsung s20 fe 5g  according to senior research analyst hanish bhatia
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: the oem even launched a 256gb variant in the quarter to meet further demand from customers looking to buy a sub  1 000 device   bhatia said
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: however  january and february tend to be a lull in the market  and with apple s current momentum  there will be less opportunities for samsung to capitalise on
headline: us smartphone market down 6  in q4 despite record iphone sales

line: bbc the reopening of non essential retail was delayed due to concerns over coronavirus cases  shops in jersey will reopen on wednesday after original plans were delayed by a week

line: it was hoped non essential retail would reopen on 27 january  but concerns over a cluster of coronavirus cases saw that date pushed back

line: on monday there were 94 active cases of coronavirus on the island three of which were in hospital
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: hairdressers are also set to reopen on 10 february  said chief minister john le fondre
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: the government would reconsider restrictions on working from home and the re opening of  some hospitality services  on 24 february  he said
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: a hospitality circuit breaker  forcing all pubs and restaurants to close  has been in place since 4 december
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: mr le fondre said there had been a reduction the number of hospital patients with covid 19
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: he said a  safe and measured  relaxation of restrictions would prevent a spike in cases
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: a  significant proportion  of over 80s had been vaccinated and over 70s could now book appointments
headline: non essential shops to reopen in jersey

line: the government was on target to vaccinate all over 50s and high risk islanders by the end of march

line: new delhi  india   february 1   prime minister narendra modi on monday assured his israeli counterpart benjamin netanyahu of punishing the perpetrators of the minor bomb blast that took place near the israeli embassy here on january 29
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: pm modi further said that india gives high importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and embassy
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: according to an official statement by the prime minister s office  during a telephonic conversation pm modi assured his counterpart that india accords the highest importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and premises  and would deploy all its resources to find and punish the perpetrators
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: both leaders expressed satisfaction about the close coordination between indian and israeli security agencies in this context   the statement said
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the leaders also spoke on fighting against the coronavirus pandemic together
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the two leaders also briefed each other about the progress of the fight against covid 19 pandemic in their respective countries  and discussed possibilities of further collaboration in this area   the pmo added
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: on january 29  a low intensity explosion took place near the israel embassy
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: no injuries have been reported in the incident so far

headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s new 5g modem integrates support for both sub 6 ghz and mmwave networks to address this opportunity and give device makers more flexibility   said jc hsu  corporate vice president and general manager of mediatek’s wireless communications business unit
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: to advance users’ 5g experiences  the new modem supports the latest global cellular standards and specifications and it packs mediatek’s signature power savings technologies along with ultra fast speeds
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s 5g modems are ideal for a range of devices  including smartphones  pcs  mi fi hotspots  broadband customer premise equipment  cpe   industrial iot applications and more
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s first generation 5g modem  the m70  is built into mediatek’s dimensity series of powerful and power efficient chipsets for 5g smartphones
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the company’s 5g portfolio also includes the mediatek t700  which will power 5g pcs set to hit the market in 2021  along with mediatek’s t750 chipset for 5g fixed wireless access routers  fwa  and mobile hotspot devices
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 has been tested against industry standards and is expected to sample with customers later in 2021
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: it offers operators around the world support for a full range of radio access technologies   3gpp release 16 standard  sub 6 ghz and mmwave dual connectivity and carrier aggregation  5g nr  fr1  with more than two carrier aggregation  5g mmwave  fr2  up to 8cc  5g carrier aggregation with mixed duplex  tdd   fdd   dynamic spectrum sharing  dss  ready  the m80 integrates mediatek’s 5g ultrasave technologies which improve on the single chip design to provide another layer of extensive power saving enhancements
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s ultrasave network environment detection and ultrasave ota content awareness technologies dynamically adjust power configuration and operating frequency based on the network environment
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 also integrates mediatek’s dynamic bandwidth part  bwp  technology which is designed to optimize bandwidth use to accommodate light or heavy data throughput requests
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: additionally  with the m80’s connected mode drx  c drx  technology the modem will regularly remain powered in connected standby even when there is no data activity
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek works closely with operators and partners around the world to bring consumers faster and more reliable 5g experiences
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: as a result  company’s 5g technology has been validated by operators in more than 100 markets
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek is also a founding member of the openrf association  which was founded to help to speed up time to market for 5g device manufacturers with interoperable 5g rf front end  rffe  solutions
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: जागरण संवाददाता  जलपाईगुड़ी  सड़क मरम्मत की मांग को लेकर लोगों ने राजमार्ग जाम किया। सोमवार को जलनाईगुड़ी के बालापाड़ा इलाके में सुबह 10 बजे से विरोध प्रदर्शन शुरू हुआ। इधर  लोगों के के प्रदर्शन के कारण सड़क के दोनों किनारे वाहनों की लंबी कतार लग गई।  लोगों का आरोप है कि बालापाड़ा से जुबली पार्क तक करीब पांच किलोमीटर तक पक्की सड़क बनाने की बात कही गई थी। लेकिन दो वर्ष बीत जाने के बावजूद सड़क की हालत जस की तस बनी हुई है। सड़क की स्थिति इतनी बदहाल है कि वाहनों को आवागमन में काफी परेशानियों का सामना करना पड़ता है। चालक जान जोखिम में डालकर आवाजाही करते हैं। सड़क के बीच बड़े बड़े गड्ढे हो गए हैं। फलस्वरूप दुर्घटना की भी संभावना हमेशा बनी रहती है।  स्थानीय निवासी राजेश राय ने कहा कि वे लोग बीते काफी दिनों से सड़क मरम्मत की मांग करते आ रहे हैं। विभिन्न सरकारी विभागों में भी आवेदन दिया गया था  लेकिन इसके बावजूद सड़क की मरम्मत नहीं हो पाई। सड़क से उड़ने वाली धूल के कारण सर्दी  खांसी समेत कई प्रकार की बीमारियां होती है। इस दिन करीब आधे घंटे बाद पुलिस के हस्तक्षेप से लोगों का प्रदर्शन समाप्त हुआ। लेकिन लोगों ने चेतावनी दी है कि अगर आगामी दिनों में सड़क मरम्मत को लेकर कोई कदम नहीं उठाया गया तो जोरदार आंदोलन किया जाएगा। दूसरी तरफ बारिश के शुरू होते ही बांध टूटने का भय बना रहता है।  जलपाईगुड़ी सिंचाई विभाग के अधिकारी सांतनु धर ने कहा कि बांध और सड़क मरम्मत के लिए जरूरी कदम उठाए जा रहे हैं।  शॉर्ट मे जानें सभी बड़ी खबरें और पायें ई पेपर ऑडियो न्यूज़ और अन्य सर्विस  डाउनलोड जागरण ऐप
